spell.name: Keystone Signet
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Signet:} Short Rest
Activate the ancient Keystone Signet, recharging most of your signets and giving them extra power.
You regain all expended uses of your signets which require you to finish a short rest or exit initiative, except {@spell Keystone Signet|GuildWars}.

For the duration, when you target a hostile creature with a signet, target each creature other than the target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@dice 2d12} psychic damage and can't cast spells or use abilities until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect. After this spell triggers {@dice 1d4 + 1} times, this spell ends.
Keystone Signet

Elite Signet. All of your signets except Keystone Signet are recharged. For 20 seconds, the next 0...5...6 time[s] you use a signet that targets a foe, all other foes adjacent to your target take 15...51...60 damage and are interrupted.

spell.name: Gash

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 6
You wound your enemy grievously.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d6} damage and, if the target is {@condition bleeding|GuildWars}, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Gash
Sword Attack. If this attack hits a Bleeding foe, you strike for 5...17...20 more damage and that foe suffers a Deep Wound, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.

spell.name: Wild Blow
entries: {@bold Unblockable}
You imbue your weapon with as much magical power as possible, striking with all your might.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's critical effects and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, any stance on the target ends.
You lose all adrenaline.
Wild Blow
Melee Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If it hits, this attack will result in a critical hit and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 5th.

spell.name: Flare
entries: Send out a searing hot flare.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d6} fire damage.

{@bold Overcast:} On a hit, each creature other than the target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target, must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

components.m: a phial of phosphor

entries: Flare
Spell. Send out a flare that strikes target foe for 20...56...65 fire damage if it hits. If you are Overcast, Flare hits adjacent foes as well.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Frenzy
entries: {@bold Stance}
Enter a frenzy, disregarding any defense.
For the duration, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn, but you take 50% more damage.
Frenzy
Stance. For 8 seconds, you attack 33% faster but take double damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Bane Signet

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range make an attack roll

entries: {@bold Signet:} Short Rest
You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of making an attack roll.

Choose one attacking creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d8} radiant damage, is knocked {@condition prone} and the attack roll misses. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
Bane Signet
Signet. Target foe takes 26...50...56 holy damage. If target foe was attacking, that foe is knocked down.

spell.name: Banish
entries: You reach out your hand and fire a blinding bolt of divine energy.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack roll against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.
If the target is a summoned creature or an undead, you have advantage on the attack roll, and on a hit, it takes an additional {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.

components.m: a crimson piece of paper

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Banish
Spell. Target foe takes 20...49...56 holy damage. This spell does double damage to summoned creatures.

spell.name: Death Nova
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Enchant a friendly creature to explode on death, damaging and {@condition corruption|GuildWars|corrupting} everything around it.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, if the creature drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends on the creature and then target each other creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the creature. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d6} necrotic damage and is corrupted for 1 minute, taking {@damage 1d4} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st and the damage of the corrupted condition increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Death Nova
Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, if target ally dies, all adjacent foes take 26...85...100 damage and are Poisoned for 15 seconds.

spell.name: Deathly Swarm
entries: You send out a swarm of undead locusts.
Choose one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} necrotic damage.

If you hit the target, the attack leaps from the target to a different creature of your choice within 20 feet of the target. Make a new attack roll with disadvantage against the new target, and make a new damage roll, which could cause the attack to leap again.
A creature can be targeted only once by each casting of this spell.

components.m: a jar filled with dirt and plants

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Deathly Swarm
Spell. Deathly Swarm flies out slowly and strikes for 30...78...90 cold damage on up to three targets in the area.

spell.name: Empathy
entries: {@bold Hex}
Increase the empathy of an enemy to an unnatural degree.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save when the target makes an attack roll, the target takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage and when the target makes a damage roll, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Empathy
Hex Spell. For 5...13...15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks, that foe takes 10...46...55 damage and deals 1...12...15 less damage.

spell.name: Fire Storm (Guild Wars)
entries: Conjure a storm of fiery bolts, which rain down from the sky.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 120-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 1d10} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

components.m: a pinte of oil

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.
Fire Storm
Spell. Create a Fire Storm at target foe's location. For 10 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for 5...29...35 fire damage each second.

spell.name: Backfire
entries: {@bold Hex}
Create an arcane feedback loop in the mind of one creature, causing their spells to become volatile.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when the target casts a spell of 1st level or higher, the target takes {@damage 1d10} psychic damage per spell slot level.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the final damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.
Backfire
Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell, that foe takes 35...119...140 damage.

spell.name: Lightning Javelin
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}
Conjure a lighting javelin in your hand and throw it in a straight line, passing through all creatures along its path to its target.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 6d6} lightning damage.
This attack ignores cover provided by other creatures.

On a hit, target each creature, other than you and the target, on the line between you and the target. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d6} lightning damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

components.m: a javelin and a piece of fleece

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
Lightning Javelin

Spell. Send out a Lightning Javelin that strikes for 15...43...50 lightning damage if it hits. Lightning Javelin interrupts attacking foes. This spell has 25% armor penetration and strikes all foes between you and your target.

spell.name: Meteor
entries: {@bold Overcast:} 5
Summon a meteor to crash down.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} bludgeoning damage, {@damage 4d6} fire damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the bludgeoning damage or the fire damage (your choice) increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.
Meteor
Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 7...91...112 fire damage and knocked down.

spell.name: Retribution
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Enchantment}
Wreath yourself or an ally in retaliatory holy light, which punishes all those who harm you.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, target the creature that dealt the damage. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 50% of the damage they dealt as radiant damage (minimum 1, maximum 10). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
Retribution
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target ally takes attack damage, this spell deals 33% of the damage back to the source (maximum 5...17...20 damage).

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage maximum increases by 10 for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Rodgort's Invocation
entries: Invoke the hellish flames of Rodgort.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 12d6} fire damage and starts {@condition burning|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d6} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

components.m: the scale of a red dragon

entries: Rodgort's Invocation
Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes are struck for 15...99...120 fire damage and set on fire for 1...3...3 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Read the Wind
entries: {@bold Preparation}
You focus your bond with nature to get insight into the air currents and the wind.

For the duration, your ranged weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d4} damage and when you make an attack roll with a ranged weapon, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the attack roll.

components.m: a stick and a piece of string

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage and attack roll bonus each increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.
Read the Wind
Preparation. For 24 seconds, your arrows move twice as fast and deal 3...9...10 extra damage.

spell.name: Shielding Hands
entries: {@bold Enchantment} You cannot choose to end {@status concentration} on this spell.
Envelop a friendly creature in spectral shielding hands, guarding them from damage.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
When this spell ends, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability.

components.m: half a dozen bushels of wool

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st and the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Shielding Hands
Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, damage and life steal received by target ally is reduced by 3...15...18. When Shielding Hands ends, that ally is healed for 5...41...50 Health.

spell.name: Orison of Healing
entries: You invigorate one friendly creature with the soothing rays of dawn.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Orison of Healing
Spell. Heal target ally for 20...60...70 Health.

spell.name: Reversal of Fortune
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Twist the fate around one friendly creature, healing them instead of harming them.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the next time the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage and the target regains hit points equal to the number rolled.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Reversal of Fortune
Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, the next time target ally would take damage or life steal, that ally gains that amount of Health instead, maximum 15...67...80.

spell.name: Healing Breeze
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
You invoke a divine healing breeze around one friendly creature you can see, healing them over time.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Healing Breeze
Enchantment Spell. For 15 seconds, target ally gains +4...8...9 Health regeneration.

spell.name: Infuse Health
entries: You sacrifice some of your health to mend another creature's injuries.
Choose one friendly creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. You lose equal to 50% of your current hit points. The target regains hit points equal to 100% of the health lost.

m.text: a drop of your own blood, a needle and a water skin

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 10% for each slot level above 1st.
Infuse Health
Spell. Lose half your current Health. Target other ally is healed for 100...129...136% of the amount you lost.

spell.name: Symbol of Wrath
entries: Sear a holy symbol of wrath on the surrounding ground, smiting all hostile creatures within 10 feet.

Conjure a 10-foot radius, 10-foot high stationary symbol of wrath at your location for the duration. Each creature, other than you, must make a Constitution saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d6} radiant damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Symbol of Wrath
Spell. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to the location in which the spell was cast take 8...27...32 holy damage each second.

spell.name: Animate Bone Horror
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Exploit a nearby corpse to create a Bone Horror.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, the target becomes a {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars}.
The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} remains for the duration or until it reaches zero hit points, at which point it will disintegrate into ash.

The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} is friendly to you and your allies for the duration. If you fall {@condition unconscious}, the {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} becomes hostile towards everything, instead of disintegrating into ash. The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} is in the DMs control.
On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to animate another bone horror this way.

components.m: pages of an old book

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell's level appears in the stat block. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
Animate Bone Horror
Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 1...14...17 bone horror.

spell.name: Blood Reneawl
entries: {@bold Enchantment}, {@bold Sacrifice:} 15%
Use some of your own blood in a ritual of renewal.
For the duration, at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
When this spell ends, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + spellcasting ability modifier.

components.m: a pinte of blood, a needle and a bag

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Blood Renewal
Enchantment Spell. For 7 seconds, you gain +3...5...6 Health regeneration. When Blood Renewal ends, you gain 40...160...190 Health.

spell.name: Faintheartedness
entries: {@bold Hex}
Curse a creature with faintheartedness making them slower and deteriorating them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, regardless of the target's abilities or magic items, the target can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn and at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} per slot level above 1st.
Faintheartedness
Hex Spell. For the next 3...13...16 seconds, target foe attacks 50% slower, and that foe suffers -0...2...3 Health degeneration.

spell.name: Life Siphon
entries: {@bold Hex}
Create a tether of life essence between you and another creature, siphoning away their vitality.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Life Siphon
Hex Spell. For 12...22...24 seconds, target foe suffers -1...3...3 Health degeneration, and you gain +1...3...3 Health regeneration.

spell.name: Soul Barbs
entries: {@bold Hex}
Curse a target to suffer each time they are targeted by another spell.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration if the target is the target of a spell which requires {@status concentration} or is an Enchantment/Hex, the target takes {@damage 2d10} necrotic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.
Soul Barbs
Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe takes 15...27...30 damage when an enchantment or hex is cast on that target.

spell.name: Vampiric Gaze
entries: Stare into the soul of a creature, stealing some of their life essence.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Vampiric Gaze
Spell. Steal up to 18...52...60 Health from target foe.

spell.name: Vampiric Touch (Guild Wars)
entries: Siphon the life energy of the creature you touch.

Choose one creature within range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d10} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.
Vampiric Touch
Skill. Touch target foe to steal up to 29...65...74 Health.

spell.name: Lava Font
entries: Create fissures around you, which spew out lava, melting everything within range.

Conjure a 10-foot radius, 10-foot high stationary lava font at your location for the duration. Each creature, other than you, must make a Dexterity saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d8} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
{@bold Overcast:} The radius of the spell increases by 5 feet.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.
Lava Font

Spell. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to the location where this spell was cast are struck for 5...41...50 fire damage each second. If you are Overcast, this spell strikes nearby foes instead of adjacent ones.

spell.name: Ether Feast
entries: Siphon the energy of a creature to heal yourself.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d8}. On a successful save, the target's initiative gets reduced by half as much.
If this spell reduces the target's initiative, you regain hit points equal to four times the initiative lost.

components.m: a shaving of ice

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Ether Feast
Spell. Target foe loses 3 Energy. You are healed 20...56...65 for each point of Energy lost.

spell.name: Glyph of Lesser Energy
entries: Invoke the Glyph of Lesser Energy by drawing it into the air as a glowing symbol.
For the duration, when you cast a spell of 1st level, the spell does not expend a spell slot. After this spell triggers {@dice 1d4 + 1} times, this spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Cyclone Axe
entries: Imbue your weapon with magical force, to strike everyone around you.
Target each creature, other than you, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects.

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: Cyclone Axe
Axe Attack. Perform a spinning axe attack striking for +4...10...12 damage to all adjacent opponents.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Executioner's Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 8
You strike with extreme ferocity, attempting a killing blow.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 4d10} damage.
Executioner's Strike
Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage.

spell.name: Hammer Bash

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 6
You put your entire weight into an extremely heavy blow.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d6} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Hammer Bash
Hammer Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If Hammer Bash hits, your target is knocked down.

spell.name: Sever Artery

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 6
You attempt to make your enemy bleed out.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d8} damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Sever Artery
Sword Attack. If this attack hits, the opponent begins Bleeding for 5...21...25 seconds, losing Health over time.

spell.name: Power Shot
entries: You infuse your next projectile with deadly force.
Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d6 + 10} force damage.
Power Shot
Bow Attack. If Power Shot hits, target foe takes 25...45...50 damage. .

m.text: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Aura of Restoration
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
You envelop yourself in a restorative aura, which cycles your spell energy to heal yourself.
For the duration, when you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} per spell slot level.
Aura of Restoration
Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, you gain 0...1...1 Energy and are healed for 200...440...500% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.

components.m: a pouch of mixed seeds and a pinte of water

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the final healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blinding Flash
entries: Conjure an extremely bright flash of light right in front of a creature's eyes.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition blinded} for the duration.
Blinding Flash
Spell. Target foe is Blinded for 3...7...8 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Shatter Delusions
entries: Shatter a harmful spell on a creature to deal damage to everyone around it.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. The latest harmful spell of 1st level or higher on the target ends. If a harmful spell was ended this way, target each creature in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. A target takes {@damage 4d6} psychic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

You regain hit points equal to {@dice 4d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
For the duration, you have vulnerability to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Healing Signet
Signet. You gain 82...154...172 Health. You have -40 armor while using this skill.

spell.name: Comfort Animal
entries: You comfort a friendly animal with a soothing word and a reassuring gesture.
Choose one friendly beast that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spell casting ability modifier.

Alternatively, you touch a beast that has died within the last minute. The target returns to life with 1 hit point. This spell can't return to life a beast that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
This spell can be used instead of the {@spell Charm Animal|GuildWars} spell, to maintain the {@condition charmed} condition on a beast {@condition charmed} by it.
Comfort Animal

Skill. You heal your animal companion for 20...87...104 Health. If your companion is dead, it is resurrected with 10...48...58% Health. If you have Comfort Animal equipped, your animal companion will travel with you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 1st.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make two ranged weapon attacks against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects.
Dual Shot

m.text: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

At 5th level, the ranged attack also deals an extra {@damage 1d8} piercing damage to the target on a hit. This damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 11th level ({@dice 2d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 3d8}).

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ability/spell fails and has no effect.
If an ability or spell failed this way, the ability/spell can't be used again for the duration.
Disrupting Chop
Axe Attack. If it hits, this attack interrupts the target's current action. If that action was a skill, that skill is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.

At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

entries: Make your enemies conditions contagious.

On a failed save, a creature gains a copy of each of the following conditions on the chosen target: {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars},  {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Poisoned} and {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

Stance. For 1...5...6 second[s], you block any attack skills used against you. For each successful block, you gain adrenaline and 5 Energy. Wary Stance ends if you use a skill.

At 5th level, the ranged attack also deals an extra {@damage 1d8} piercing damage to the target on a hit. This damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 11th level ({@dice 2d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 3d8}).

On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d8} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage. Choose one of the d8s. The number rolled on that die determines the spell's damage type, as shown below.
If you roll the same number on two or more d8s, a target's initiative gets reduced by the number.

entries: {@bold Hex}
Create a diversion to distract a creature, causing their next ability or spell to be temporarily forgotten.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the next spell or ability the target uses can't be used again for the duration.
Diversion
Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe uses a skill, that skill takes an additional 10...47...56 seconds to recharge.

components.m: a shiny silver coin

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Eruption
entries: Cause an eruption of dust and rocks at a location of your choosing.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, each creature in a 15-foot-radius, 60-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} bludgeoning damage and is {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Eruption
Spell. Cause an Eruption at target foe's location. Each second for 5 seconds, foes near this location are struck for 10...34...40 earth damage and are Blinded for 10 seconds.

components.m: a pinch of sand and a fan

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Endure Pain
entries: Greatly increase your pain tolerance for a short duration.
For the duration, your hit point maximum and current hit points increase by {@dice 3d10} + Constitution modifier.
Endure Pain
Skill. For 7...16...18 seconds you have an additional 90...258...300 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, your hit points increase by an additional {@dice 2d10} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Lightning Reflexes
entries: {@bold Stance}
You magically enhance your reflexes and attack speed.
For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC and you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn.
Lightning Reflexes
Stance. For 5...10...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks, and you attack 33% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Live Vicariously
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Enchantment}
Imbue a creature's strikes with holy energy, healing yourself every time that creature hits with an attack.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target hits with an attack, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4}.
Live Vicariously
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target ally hits a foe, you gain 2...14...17 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Putrid Explosion
entries: Explode a corpse.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target to target each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 8d6} necrotic. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Putrid Explosion
Spell. The corpse nearest your target explodes, sending out a shockwave that deals 24...101...120 damage to nearby foes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Energy Burn
entries: Make the energy in a creature burn it up from the inside.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d6}.
If this spell reduces the target's initiative, the target takes 4 psychic damage per initiative lost. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
Energy Burn
Spell. Target foe loses 1...8...10 Energy and takes 9 damage for each point of Energy lost.

spell.name: Frozen Burst
entries: {@bold Hex}
Make spikes of ice burst out from you, slowing creatures down.

Target each creature other than you within range. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} cold damage, and for the duration the target's speed is reduced by 66%. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
Frozen Burst
Hex Spell. All nearby foes are struck for 10...70...85 cold damage and move 66% slower for 3...7...8 seconds.

components.m: a glass phial filled with freezing water

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Hamstring
entries: You attempt to cripple a creature, slowing their movement.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes {@condition crippled|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

At 5th level, the melee attack also deals an extra {@damage 1d8} slashing damage to the target on a hit. This damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 11th level ({@dice 2d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 3d8}).
Hamstring
Sword Attack. If this attack hits, your target is Crippled for 3...13...15 seconds, slowing his[sic] movement.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

spell.name: Favorable Winds
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Summon a nature spirit of favorable winds, improving ranged weapon attacks for everyone in the area.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit, they have advantage on ranged weapon attack rolls, and their ranged weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d6} damage.
Favorable Winds
Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, arrows move twice as fast and strike for +6 damage. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

components.m: a small flag

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Mending (Guild Wars)
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Enchantment}
Bond yourself to a creature, healing them every turn.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Mending
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally gains +1...3...4 Health regeneration.

components.m: a pair of matching lockets

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Shadow Strike
entries: Strike a creature with a shadowy claw, stealing life from them if they are above 50% health.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} necrotic damage. If the target was above 50% of their maximum hit points, the target takes {@damage 3d6} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of that necrotic damage dealt.
Shadow Strike
Spell. Target foe takes 12...41...48 shadow damage. If that foe's Health is above 50%, you steal up to 12...41...48 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Energy Tap
entries: Siphon energy from a creature to gain it yourself.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d8}. On a successful save, the target's initiative gets reduced by half as much.
If this spell reduces the target's initiative, your initiative gets increased by twice the initiative lost.
Energy Tap
Spell. Target foe loses 4...6...7 Energy. You gain 2 Energy for each point of Energy lost.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ice Spikes
entries: {@bold Hex}
Cause icy spikes to burst out from the ground.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} cold damage, and for the duration the target's speed is reduced by 66%. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
Ice Spikes
Hex Spell. Target and adjacent foes are struck for 20...68...80 cold damage and move 66% slower for 2...5...6 seconds.

components.m: a gallon of water and a 2-foot metal tube

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Mighty Blow

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 7
You put your entire might behind a mighty blow.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 5d8} damage.
Mighty Blow
Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage.

spell.name: Feral Lunge
entries: Command your pet to attempt a Feral Lunge, {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} attacking creatures on a hit.

Choose one beast, which obeys your verbal commands, that can hear you within range. The beast uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the beast can see within the beast's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d6} damage and, if the target attacked on its last turn, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Feral Lunge
Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Feral Lunge that deals +5...29...35 damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is attacking, that foe suffers from Bleeding for 5...21...25 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Purge Conditions
entries: Purge most conditions on a creature.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. End {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars},  {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Poisoned} and {@condition Weakness|GuildWars} on the target.
Purge Conditions
Spell. Remove all conditions (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, and Deep Wound) from target ally.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Soul Feast
entries: Feast on the remains of a creature.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 3d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Soul Feast
Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to gain 50...234...280 Health.

components.m: a cutlery set

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Illusion of Haste
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Temporarily move faster, but slow down after.
End the {@condition crippled|GuildWars} condition on yourself. For the duration, your speed is increased by 10 feet. When this spell ends, you become {@condition crippled|GuildWars} for 2 rounds.
This spell's duration increases by 1 round when you reach 5th level (4 rounds), 11th level (5 rounds), and 17th level (6 rounds).
Illusion of Haste
Enchantment Spell. For 5...10...11 seconds you are no longer Crippled, and you move 33% faster. When Illusion of Haste ends, you become Crippled for 3 seconds.

spell.name: Magnetic Aura
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Envelop yourself in a magnetic aura, deflecting damage back to an attacker.

For the duration, if you are the target of an attack roll, the attack roll misses you, the attacker must make a Dexterity saving throw and this spell ends. On a failed save, the attacker takes {@damage 3d6} force damage. On a successful save, the attacker takes half as much damage.
{@bold Overcast:} Choose any number of friendly creatures that you can see within 150-feet. A target also gains the effect of this spell.
Magnetic Aura
Enchantment Spell. For 1...4...5 second[s], you block the next attack against you and deal 10...42...50 damage to your attacker. If you are Overcast, all party members in earshot are also enchanted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Penetrating Blow

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 5, {@bold Armor Penetration}
You crush past an enemies defenses.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d8} damage.
Penetrating Blow
Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. This axe attack has 20% armor penetration.

spell.name: Dodge
entries: {@bold Stance}
You focus on dodging ranged attacks.
For the duration, your speed increases by 10 feet, and you have a +2 bonus to AC against ranged weapon attacks.
When you make an attack roll, this spell ends.
Dodge
Stance. For 5...10...11 seconds, you move 33% faster and have a 27...65...75% chance to block incoming projectiles. Dodge ends if you attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the AC bonus increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Shield Stance
entries: {@bold Stance}
Enter a defensive stance, protecting yourself with your shield.
For the duration, if you are wielding a shield, you have a +5 bonus to AC and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.

components.m: a shield worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd, and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.
Shield Stance
Stance. For 1...5...6 second[s], while wielding a shield, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks, and damage is reduced by 2 for each rank of Strength (maximum 15 damage reduction).

spell.name: Penetrating Attack
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}
You fire a penetrating shot, which pierces your enemies defenses.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d8} damage.
Penetrating Attack
Bow Attack. If Penetrating Attack hits, you strike for +5...21...25 damage and this attack has 10% armor penetration.

m.text: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Mantra of Flame
entries: {@bold Stance}
Repeat a mantra to protect yourself from fire.
For the duration, you have resistance to fire damage and when you take fire damage, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d4}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Mantra of Flame
Stance. For 30...78...90 seconds, whenever you take fire damage, the damage is reduced by 26...45...50% and you gain 2 Energy.

spell.name: Mantra of Frost
entries: {@bold Stance}
Repeat a mantra to protect yourself from the cold.
For the duration, you have resistance to cold damage and when you take cold damage, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d4}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Mantra of Frost
Stance. For 30...78...90 seconds, whenever you take cold damage, the damage is reduced by 26...45...50% and you gain 2 Energy.

spell.name: Mantra of Lightning
entries: {@bold Stance}
Repeat a mantra to protect yourself from lightning.
For the duration, you have resistance to lightning damage and when you take lightning damage, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d4}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Mantra of Lightning
Stance. For 30...78...90 seconds, whenever you take lightning damage, the damage is reduced by 26...45...50% and you gain 2 Energy.

spell.name: Mantra of Earth
entries: {@bold Stance}
Repeat a mantra to protect yourself from bludgeoning.
For the duration, you have resistance to bludgeoning damage and when you take bludgeoning damage, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d4}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Mantra of Earth
Stance. For 30...78...90 seconds, whenever you take earth damage, the damage is reduced by 26...45...50% and you gain 2 Energy.

spell.name: Elemental Resistance
entries: {@bold Stance}
Enhance your elemental defense at the cost of becoming vulnerable to physical damage.
For the duration, you have resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning and thunder damage, but you have vulnerability to bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage.
Elemental Resistance
Stance. For 30...78...90 seconds, You gain +40 armor against elemental damage, but you lose 24...14...12 armor against physical damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Conjure Flame
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Conjure flames around a creature's weapons.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target's weapon attacks deal fire damage and deal an additional {@damage 1d6} fire damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.
Conjure Flame
Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, if you're wielding a fire weapon, your attacks strike for an additional 5...17...20 fire damage.

spell.name: Conjure Frost
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Conjure frost around a creature's weapons.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target's weapon attacks deal cold damage and deal an additional {@damage 1d6} cold damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.
Conjure Frost
Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, if you're wielding a cold weapon, your attacks strike for an additional 5...17...20 cold damage.

spell.name: Conjure Lightning
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Conjure lightning around a creature's weapons.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target's weapon attacks deal lightning damage and deal an additional {@damage 1d6} lightning damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.
Conjure Lightning
Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, if you're wielding a lightning weapon, your attacks strike for an additional 5...17...20 lightning damage.

spell.name: Eviscerate

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 8, {@bold Elite}
You eviscerate a creature, inflicting a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars}.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 5d6} damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Eviscerate
Elite Axe Attack. If Eviscerate hits, you strike for +1...25...31 damage and inflict a Deep Wound, lowering your target's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.

spell.name: Shield of Judgment
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Shield a creature with the shield of judgment, which knocks attackers {@condition prone} if they hit the creature.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage from an attack, target the creature that dealt the damage. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d8} radiant damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.
Shield of Judgment
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, anyone striking target ally with an attack is knocked down and suffers 5...41...50 holy damage.

spell.name: Lingering Curse
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Curse an area, damaging creatures every round and reducing their healing.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, if a target regains hit points, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the healing and at the start of each of a target's turns, a target takes {@damage 1d12} necrotic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 2nd and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.
Lingering Curse
Elite Hex Spell. For 6...25...30 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer -0...2...3 Health degeneration, and gain 20% less benefit from healing.

spell.name: Shatter Hex
entries: Shatter a harmful spell on a friendly creature to deal damage to everyone around it.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. The latest harmful spell on the target ends. If a harmful spell was ended this way, target each creature other than the target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. A target takes {@damage 3d6} psychic damage.
Shatter Hex
Spell. Remove a hex from target ally. If a hex is removed, foes near that ally take 30...102...120 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Shatter Enchantment
entries: Shatter a beneficial spell on a hostile creature to deal damage to it.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the latest beneficial spell on the target ends. If a beneficial spell was ended this way, the target takes {@dice 3d6} psychic damage.
Shatter Enchantment
Spell. Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, that foe takes 14...83...100 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Power Block

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within 60 feet of you casting a spell

entries: {@bold Elite}
You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell and lock them out of spells of the same school of magic.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell fails and has no effect. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.

If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, the target must make an Intelligence saving throw with disadvantage. On a failure, spells of the same school of magic can't be used again for the duration. If you did not successfully interrupt a spell this way, the creature makes the saving throw with advantage.
Power Block
Elite Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill and all skills of the same attribute are disabled for 1...10...12 seconds and that skill is interrupted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the interrupted spell has no effect if its level is less than or equal to the level of the spell slot you used and the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Meteor Shower
entries: {@bold Overcast:} 5
Summon a shower of meteors at a specific location every turn.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 120-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} bludgeoning damage, {@damage 4d6} fire damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
Meteor Shower
Spell. Create a Meteor Shower at target foe's location. For 9 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for 7...91...112 fire damage and knocked down every 3 seconds.

components.m: a small rock and a sextant

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the bludgeoning damage or the fire damage (your choice) increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Called Shot
entries: {@bold Unblockable}
Fire an extremely fast shot, which is more likely to hit and ignores any temporary AC bonuses.
Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack with advantage against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects.
Called Shot
Bow Attack. Shoot an arrow that moves 3 times faster and cannot be blocked.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Quick Shot
entries: {@bold Elite}
Fire a quick shot, which is more likely to hit.
Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack with advantage against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects.
The number of ranged attacks you can make when you cast this spell increases by 1 when you reach 5th level (2 attacks), 11th level (3 attacks), and 17th level (4 attacks).
Quick Shot
Elite Bow Attack. Shoot an arrow that moves twice as fast.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

spell.name: Flurry
entries: {@bold Stance}
Increase your attack speed at the cost of damage.
For the duration, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn, and you deal 50% less damage with weapon attacks.
Flurry
Stance. For 5 seconds, your attack rate is increased by 33%, but you deal 25% less damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Skull Crack

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 8, {@bold Elite}
You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of using an ability or casting a spell, and if it was a spell, you daze that creature.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ability/spell fails and has no effect.

If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, the target must make a Constitution saving throw with disadvantage. On a failure, the target is {@condition dazed|GuildWars} for the duration. If you did not successfully interrupt a spell this way, the creature makes the saving throw with advantage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Skull Crack
Elite Melee Attack. If it hits, this attack interrupts the target's current action. If that foe was casting a spell, that foe is Dazed for 10 seconds.

spell.name: Weaken Armor
entries: Weaken the armor of creatures in an area.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target has {@condition cracked armor|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Weaken Armor
Spell. Target foe and foes adjacent to your target have Cracked Armor for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Virulence
entries: {@bold Elite}
Inflict multiple conditions on a creature already suffering from a condition.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, if the target is suffering from a condition, the target is {@condition Weakness|GuildWars|weakened}, is {@condition corruption|GuildWars|corrupted} taking {@damage 2d6} damage and is {@condition disease|GuildWars|diseased} taking {@damage 3d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Virulence
Elite Spell. If target foe was already suffering from a condition, that foe suffers from Disease, Poison, and Weakness for 3...13...15 seconds.

components.m: the bottled cough of a sick person

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Inferno
entries: Create an inferno of flames at your location.

Target each creature other than you within range. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 8d6} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Inferno
Spell. All adjacent foes are struck for 30...114...135 fire damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Phoenix
entries: A fiery Phoenix rises at your location and flies out, exploding on impact.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 8d6} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

{@bold Overcast:} When you cast the spell, you can choose any number of creatures. The chosen creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against the spell, and take no damage if they would normally take half damage on a successful save. Additionally, if a chosen creature was in the radius of the spell, that target gains temporary hit points equal to half the damage rolled.
Phoenix

Spell. A fiery Phoenix rises at your location and flies out to your target, exploding on impact. This explosion strikes your target and nearby foes for 10...50...60 fire damage. If you are Overcast, allies in the blast radius are healed for 20...68...80 Health.

components.m: the feather of a chicken and a pinch of sanguine dusting

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Resurrect
entries: Resurrect a party member from range, but at the cost of their actions next turn.

Choose one friendly creature, which has not been dead for more than 1 minute, that you can see within range. The target returns to life with 25% of their maximum hit points. The target is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of their next turn.
This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
Resurrect
Spell. Resurrect target party member. Target party member is returned to life with 25% Health and zero Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 4th.

m.text: gems worth 300 gp for each target, which the spell consumes

spell.name: Shield of Deflection
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Shield a creature with a spectral shield, which blocks incoming attacks and reduces the damage they take.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target has a +5 bonus to AC and when the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Shield of Deflection
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 3...9...10 seconds, target ally has a 75% chance to block attacks and gains 15...27...30 armor.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the AC bonus increases by 1 for each slot level above 5th and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Crippling Anguish
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Psychically torture a creature, reducing their speed, limiting their attacks, and hurting them every turn.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, the target's speed is halved, regardless of the target's abilities or magic items, the target can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn and at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 2d10} psychic damage.
Crippling Anguish
Elite Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, target moves and attacks 50% slower and suffers -1...7...8 Health degeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Lightning Orb
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}
Throw an orb of lightning at a target.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d8} lightning damage.
Lightning Orb
Spell. Send out a Lightning Orb that strikes target foe for 10...82...100 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Lightning Strike
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}, {@bold Hex}
Conjure a lightning bolt above a creature's head.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d8} lightning damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
{@bold Overcast:} You can make this spell a hex to repeat the effect against the same target next turn as a bonus action.
Lightning Strike

Hex Spell. Strike target foe for 5...41...50 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration. If you are Overcast, that foe is hexed with Lightning Strike for 3 seconds. When this hex ends, that foe is struck again for 5...41...50 lightning damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Lightning Surge
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}, {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Start charging up a lightning sure above a creature, which comes crashing down at the beginning of that creature's turn.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, when this spell ends because its duration ran out, the target takes {@damage 8d6} lightning damage, is knocked {@condition prone} and has {@condition cracked armor|GuildWars} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Lightning Surge
Elite Hex Spell. After 3 seconds, target foe is knocked down and struck for 14...83...100 lightning damage, and has Cracked Armor for 5...17...20 seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Resurrection Signet
entries: {@bold Signet:} Level Up
Resurrect a party member from range, but at the cost of some of their actions next turn.

Choose one friendly creature, which has not been dead for more than 2 rounds, that you can see within range. The target returns to life with 100% of their maximum hit points. On the target's next turn, the target can use either an action or a bonus action, not both.
This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
Resurrection Signet
Signet. Resurrect target party member. That party member is returned to life with 100% Health and 25% Energy. This signet only recharges when you gain a morale boost.

m.text: gems worth 600 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: {@bold Signet:} Replaced
Capture the knowledge of a powerful creature.

Choose one hostile dead boss creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes, that you can see within range. Choose one spell which the target had prepared, that you could learn and that is equal to or lower than this spell's level, and replace this spell with the chosen spell permanently.
Signet of Capture
Signet. Choose one skill from a nearby dead Boss of your profession. Signet of Capture is permanently replaced by that skill. If that skill was elite, gain 250 XP for every level you have earned.
