spell.name: Counter Blow

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 4
Use the momentary opening of a creature that attacked to attempt to knock them {@condition prone}.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d4} damage and, if the target attacked on its last turn, must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Counter Blow
Hammer Attack. If this attack hits an attacking foe, that foe is knocked down.

spell.name: Backbreaker

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 9, {@bold Elite}
Brutally attempt to break a creature's spine, preventing them from walking.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 3d10} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
To stand up from {@condition prone}, the target must first succeed on a Strength saving throw or waste its movement in the attempt.
Backbreaker
Elite Hammer Attack. If Backbreaker hits, you strike for +1...16...20 damage and your target is knocked down. If you have 8 Strength or higher, this knockdown lasts 4 seconds.

spell.name: Heal Other
entries: Heal another creature.
Choose one creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 4d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Heal Other
Spell. Heal target other ally for 35...151...180 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Healing Hands
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Envelop a creature in divine healing hands, healing them every time they take damage.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration when the target takes damage, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Healing Hands
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target ally takes damage, that ally is healed for 5...29...35 Health.

components.m: a pair of sterilized gloves

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Crude Swing
entries: Strike your target and all creatures within 5 feet of them with a wide-reaching swing.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Target each creature other than you in a 5-foot-radius centered on the target. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects.
Crude Swing
Hammer Attack. Attack all adjacent foes. Each foe you hit is struck for +1...16...20 damage.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Warrior's Endurance
entries: {@bold Elite}
Magically enhance your endurance, enabling you to act quicker.
For the duration, when you hit with a melee attack, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d6}.
Warrior's Endurance
Elite Skill. For 5...29...35 seconds, you gain 3 Energy each time you hit with a melee attack. Warrior's Endurance cannot raise your Energy above 10...22...25.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Staggering Blow

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 4
Attempt to stagger your opponent, weakening them on hit.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d4} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition weakness|GuildWars|weakened} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Strength saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Staggering Blow
Hammer Attack. If this hammer blow hits, your target will suffer from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds.

spell.name: Overbearing Smash
entries: Exploit a creature's momentary vulnerability if they are {@condition prone}, to daze them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d6} damage and, if the target is knocked {@condition prone}, must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition dazed|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Overbearing Smash
Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +1...16...20 damage. If target foe is knocked down, that foe is Dazed for 1...7...8 second[s].

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Magehunter's Smash

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 8, {@bold Elite}, {@bold Unblockable}
Attempt to knock a creature {@condition prone}, creatures with a beneficial effect on them have a harder time resisting.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 3d8} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
If the target is under the effect of a beneficial spell, the target has disadvantage on the saving throw and this attack gains the Unblockable property.
Magehunter's Smash
Elite Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, target foe is knocked down. If your target is under the effects of an enchantment, this attack cannot be blocked.

spell.name: Power Attack
entries: Imbue your weapon with powerful magic.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 3d8} damage.
Power Attack
Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Sprint
entries: {@bold Stance}
Channel your magic into increasing your movement speed.
For the duration, your speed is increased by 25%.
This spell's duration increases by 1 round when you reach 5th level (2 rounds), 11th level (3 rounds), and 17th level (4 rounds).
Sprint
Stance. For 8...13...14 seconds, you move 25% faster.

spell.name: Watch Yourself!
entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 4
Increase your group's resilience.
Choose any number of creatures that can hear you within range. For the duration, the next time a target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
"Watch Yourself!"
Shout. Party members within earshot gain +5...21...25 armor for 10 seconds. This shout ends after 10 incoming attacks.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Quickening Zephyr
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Summon a nature spirit of quickening zephyr, allowing multiple spells to be cast per turn, but increasing the spell slot usage.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit, they can cast spells as an action, even if they already cast a spell as a bonus action on their turn, and they must expend additional spell slots to cast a spell.
Quickening Zephyr

Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all skills recharge twice as fast and cost 30% more of the base Energy to cast. This spirit dies after 15...39...45 seconds.

components.m: a phial of amphetamine

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Smite
entries: Smite a creature with radiant energy, punishing them for attacking.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d8} radiant damage and if the target attacked on its last turn, the target takes another {@damage 3d8} radiant damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
Smite
Spell. This attack [sic] deals 10...46...55 Holy [sic] damage. If attacking, your target takes an additional 10...30...35 Holy [sic] damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Strength of Honor
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Enchantment}
Imbue a creature with the strength of honor, increasing their melee weapon damage.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target's weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d6} damage.
Strength of Honor
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally deals 5...21...25 more damage in melee.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Vital Blessing
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Enchantment}
Bond yourself to a creature, improving their vitality.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 10.
Vital Blessing
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally has +40...168...200 maximum Health.

components.m: a basket filled with fresh vegtables

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target's hit points increase by an additional 10 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Shadow of Fear
entries: {@bold Hex}
Create a specter of fear in the mind of a group of creatures, preventing them from attacking.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, regardless of a target's abilities or magic items, a target can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during their turn.
Shadow of Fear
Hex Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes attack 50% slower for the next 5...25...30 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Vile Touch
entries: Touch a creature with a damaging touch.
Choose one creature within range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d12} necrotic damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d12} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d12}), 11th level ({@dice 3d12}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d12}).
Vile Touch
Skill. Touch target foe to deal 20...56...65 damage.

spell.name: Phantom Pain
entries: {@bold Hex:} You cannot choose to end {@status concentration} on this spell.
Create the illusion of pain in a creature's mind.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 1d10} psychic damage. When this spell ends, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} for 1 minute.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Phantom Pain
Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe suffers -1...3...4 Health degeneration. When Phantom Pain ends, that foe suffers a Deep Wound, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Power Leak

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within 60 feet of you casting a spell

entries: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell and drain their energy.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell fails and has no effect. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.

If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, the target must make a Charisma saving throw with disadvantage. On a failure, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d12}. If you did not successfully interrupt a spell this way, the creature makes the saving throw with advantage.
Power Leak
Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and target foe loses 3...14...17 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the interrupted spell has no effect if its level is less than or equal to the level of the spell slot you used - 1, and the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Shard Storm
entries: {@bold Hex}
Conjure up a storm of ice, and fling it at a creature, slowing them down on a hit.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} cold damage and for the duration the target's speed is reduced by 66%.
Shard Storm
Hex Spell. Send out an ice shard that strikes target foe for 10...70...85 cold damage if it hits and causing target foe to move 66% slower for 2...5...6 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st and the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Ward Against Elements
entries: Conjure a ward at your location, protecting your allies from elemental damage.

Conjure a 20-foot radius stationary ward at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. When a target takes acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, if the target is in the radius of the spell, you can roll {@dice 2d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Ward Against Elements
Ward Spell. You create a Ward Against Elements at your current location. For 8...18...20 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area gain +24 armor against elemental damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Fireball (Guild Wars)
entries: Send out a precise ball of fire that explodes on impact.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d6} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Fireball
Spell. Send out a ball of fire that strikes target foe and all adjacent foes for 7...91...112 fire damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Fire Attunement
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Empower your fire magic, by attuning to the fire.
For the Duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast a fire themed spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 15 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.

components.m: a pair of darkened glasses

entries: Fire Attunement
Enchantment Spell. For 36...55...60 seconds, you are attuned to Fire. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use Fire Magic.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 24 hours.

spell.name: Air Attunement
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Empower your air magic, by attuning to air.
For the Duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast an air, lightning or thunder themed spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 15 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.

components.m: a loop of sticks, and 3 feet of yarn

entries: Air Attunement
Enchantment Spell. For 36...55...60 seconds, you are attuned to Air. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill whenever you use Air Magic.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 24 hours.

spell.name: Water Attunement
entries: Empower your water magic, by attuning to water.
For the Duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast a water themed spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 15 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.

components.m: a bucket full of fresh spring water

entries: Water Attunement
Enchantment Spell. For 36...55...60 seconds, you are attuned to Water. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use Water Magic.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 24 hours.

spell.name: Winter
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Call forth a spirit of winter, which converts all elemental damage to cold damage.
Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit and takes acid, fire, lightning or thunder damage, they take cold damage instead.
Winter
Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For creatures within its range, all elemental damage is cold damage instead. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

components.m: a snowball

entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Divine Boon
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Enchantment}
Imbue yourself with divine energy to heal every time you support a creature.

For the duration, when you target a friendly creature with a spell of 1st level or higher, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier and your initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d4}.
Divine Boon

Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever you cast a Protection Prayer [sic] or Divine Favor spell that targets an ally, that ally is healed for 15...51...60 Health, and you lose 1 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Defile Flesh
entries: {@bold Hex}
Utter a corrupting curse, defiling a creature's flesh, making it so they heal for less.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, when the target regains hit points, they regain 33% less hit points.
Defile Flesh
Hex Spell. For 5...29...35 seconds, target foe gains only two-thirds Health from healing.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Irresistible Blow
entries: Deliver a mighty blow which is sure to hit.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d6} damage.
On a miss, the target takes {@damage 1d6} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Irresistible Blow
Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. If Irresistible Blow is blocked, your target is knocked down and takes 5...17...20 damage.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Debilitating Shot
entries: Fire a debilitating shot, lowering initiative on hit.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 2d6}.
Debilitating Shot
Bow Attack. If Debilitating Shot hits, your target loses 1...8...10 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: {@bold Hex}
Magically convince a creature to be pacifist, this lasts until the creature takes damage.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, regardless of the target's abilities or magic items, the target can't make melee or ranged weapon attacks.
When the target takes damage, this spell ends on that target.
Pacifism
Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target foe cannot attack. This effect ends if the target takes damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Necrotic Traversal
entries: Exploit a corpse to teleport to its location and corrupt creatures around it.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target so that you can teleport within 5 feet of the target to an unoccupied space that you can see. Then target each creature other than you in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition corruption|GuildWars|corrupted} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Necrotic Traversal
Spell. Exploit a random corpse. You teleport to that corpse's location and all nearby foes become Poisoned for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Ice Prison
entries: {@bold Hex}
Encase a creature's legs in ice, slowing them down considerably.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the target's speed is reduced by 66%.
Ice Prison
Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target foe's legs are encased in ice, causing the foe to move 66% slower.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels

spell.name: Seeking Blade

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d8} damage.

On a miss, the target takes {@damage 1d8} damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Seeking Blade
Sword Attack. If this attack hits you strike for +1...16...20 damage. If Seeking Blade is blocked, your target begins Bleeding for 25 seconds and takes 1...16...20 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

Melandru's Assault
Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Melandru's Assault that deals +5...17...20 damage to all nearby foes.

entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

Well of Blood
Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Blood at its location. For 8...18...20 seconds, allies in that area receive +1...5...6 Health regeneration.

entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the temporary hit points increase by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

Sword Attack. This attack strikes for +1...32...40 damage if it hits.

Bull's Charge
Elite Stance. For 5...10...11 seconds, you move 33% faster and if you strike a moving foe in melee, that foe is knocked down. Bull's Charge ends if you use a skill.

Enchantment Spell. For 8...46...56 seconds, whenever you cast a spell, you gain 1 Energy for each foe in the area.

entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

entries: Conjure a ward at your location, slowing down foes.
Conjure a 20-foot radius stationary ward at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. If a target is in the radius of the spell, a target's speed is halved.
Ward Against Foes
Ward Spell. You create a Ward Against Foes at your current location. For 8...18...20 seconds, non-spirit foes in this area move 50% slower.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Pin Down
Bow Attack. If Pin Down hits, your target is Crippled for 3...13...15 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, the target gains 2 strikes of adrenalin and the target's initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d4}.

Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally gains adrenaline and 1 Energy after taking damage. (The amount of adrenaline gained increases depending on your rank in Smiting Prayers.)

entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase in initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd and the adrenaline gain increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Mark of Subversion

Etch a mark of subversion into the air to curse a creature, stealing health from them and stopping the spell, they next time they target an ally of theirs.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the next time the target casts a spell that targets an ally of theirs, the spell fails and has no effect, the target takes {@damage 6d4} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.
Mark of Subversion
Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe casts a spell that targets an ally of that foe, the spell fails and you steal up to 10...76...92 Health from that foe.

Fragility
Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target and adjacent foes take 5...17...20 damage each time they suffer or recover from a new condition.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Whirlwind (Guild Wars)
entries: Create a chilling blast of air which swirls around you, damaging all creatures and knocking them {@condition prone} if they attacked during their last turn.

Target each creature other than you within range. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d6} cold damage and, if a target attacked on its last turn, is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
{@bold Overcast:} The radius of the spell increases by 5 feet.
Whirlwind
Spell. All adjacent foes take 15...63...75 cold damage. Attacking foes struck by Whirlwind are knocked down. If you are Overcast, this spell strikes nearby instead of adjacent.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Distracting Blow

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: Quickly swipe at your foes, potentially disrupting their spell or ability.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range of your weapon. Target each creature other than you in a 5-foot-radius centered on the target. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, if a target is casting a spell or using an ability, the ability/spell fails and has no effect. Otherwise, on a failed save, a target can't cast spells or use abilities until the end of their next turn.
Distracting Blow
Melee Attack. Swipe your weapon at the target, dealing no damage but disrupting the target's current action (and the actions of foes adjacent to your target).

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 4th.

spell.name: Revive Animal

Choose any number of friendly dead beasts, which obey your verbal commands and which have not been dead for more than 1 minute, that you can see within range. A target returns to life with 30% of their maximum hit points.
This spell can be used instead of the {@spell Charm Animal|GuildWars} spell, to maintain the {@condition charmed} condition on a beast {@condition charmed} by it.
Revive Animal
Skill. Resurrect all nearby allied animal companions. They come back to life with 10...77...94% Health.

components.m: a pinch of salt

entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the % increases by 10% for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Divine Spirit
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Suffuse yourself with the spirit of the divine, accessing your spells for less cost.
For the duration, when you cast a Cleric, Druid or Paladin spell of 2nd level or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level lower than required.
Divine Spirit
Enchantment Spell. For 1...11...14 second[s], Monk Spells cost you 5 less Energy to cast. (Minimum cost: 1 Energy.)

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 24 hours.

spell.name: Rotting Flesh
entries: Make a creature start to rot, to {@condition disease|GuildWars} them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is  {@condition disease|GuildWars|diseased} for the duration, taking {@damage 3d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Rotting Flesh
Spell. Target fleshy foe becomes Diseased for 10...22...25 seconds, slowly losing Health.

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within 60 feet of you casting a spell

entries: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell and drive a psychic spike into their brain.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell fails and has no effect. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.

If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, the target must make an Intelligence saving throw with disadvantage. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 4d6} psychic damage. If you did not successfully interrupt a spell this way, the creature makes the saving throw with advantage.
Power Spike
Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or a chant, that skill is interrupted and target foe takes 30...102...120 damage.

entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the interrupted spell has no effect if its level is less than or equal to the level of the spell slot you used -1 and the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Blurred Vision

Blurred Vision
Hex Spell. For 4...9...10 seconds, target foe and adjacent foes are hexed with Blurred Vision. While hexed, those foes have a 50% chance to miss with attacks.

Stance. For 15...27...30 seconds, recharge times for your skills are reduced by 33%. Serpent's Quickness ends if your Health drops below 50%.

Protector's Strike
Melee Attack. If this attack strikes a moving foe, you strike for 10...34...40 more damage.

spell.name: Whirling Defense
entries: {@bold Stance}
Whirl around, blocking incoming attacks, and deflecting projectiles, damaging all creatures around you.

Whirling Defense
Stance. For 8...18...20 seconds, you have 75% chance to block attacks. Whenever you block a projectile in this way, adjacent foes take 5...10...11 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd and the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Remove Hex
entries: Remove the latest harmful spell on a creature.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. The latest harmful spell on the target ends.
Remove Hex
Spell. Remove a hex from target ally.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Strip Enchantment
entries: Strip the latest beneficial spell on a hostile creature to steal life from it.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the latest beneficial spell on the target ends. If a beneficial spell was ended this way, the target takes {@dice 3d6} necrotic damage per spell ended, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.
Strip Enchantment
Spell. Remove 0...2...2 enchantment[s] from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, you steal 5...53...65 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, one additional spell ends for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Drain Enchantment
entries: Drain a beneficial spell on a hostile creature to heal yourself and improve your initiative.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The Target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the latest beneficial spell on the target ends. If a beneficial spell was ended this way, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier and your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d6}.
Drain Enchantment
Spell. Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, you gain 8...15...17 Energy and 40...104...120 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd and the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ice Spear
entries: Conjure up an ice spear and hurl it at a creature, healing yourself if you are {@condition overcast|GuildWars}.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d6} cold damage.
{@bold Overcast:} At the start of your next turn, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d6}.
Ice Spear
Enchantment Spell. Send out an Ice Spear, striking target foe for 10...50...60 cold damage if it hits. If you are Overcast, you gain +1...3...4 Health regeneration for 5 seconds.

components.m: a drop of water

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage and healing each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Swift Chop
entries: Deliver a swift chop which is sure to hit.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d8} damage.
On a miss, the target takes {@damage 1d8} damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Swift Chop
Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +1...16...20 damage. If Swift Chop is blocked, target foe takes 1...16...20 damage and suffers a Deep Wound for 20 seconds.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Call of Protection
entries: Call out to your animal companions, protecting them with abjuration magic.
Choose any number of friendly beasts, which obey your verbal commands, that can hear you within. When a target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d12} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Call of Protection
Shout. For 120 seconds, your animal companion has a 5...17...20 base damage reduction.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Succor
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Enchantment}
Grant a person succor by healing them every turn and improving their spellcasting.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains 2 hit points. Additionally, when the creature would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 3rd level or lower, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 19 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Succor
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this Enchantment, target other ally gains +1 Health and +1 Energy regeneration, but you lose 1 Energy each time that ally casts a Spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the healing increases each by 2 for each slot level above 3rd and the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 3rd. Additionally, the number you need to roll decreases by 1 for every two slot levels above 3rd.

spell.name: Suffering
entries: {@bold Hex}
Utter a foul curse, causing suffering in an area.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of a target's turns, a target takes {@damage 2d4} necrotic damage.
Suffering
Hex Spell. For 6...25...30 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer -0...2...3 Health degeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Inspired Hex
entries: Remove a negative spell on a creature, gain initiative and replace this spell with the removed spell for the duration.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. The latest harmful spell on the target ends. If a harmful spell was ended this way, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d4} and replace this spell with the ended spell for the duration.
Inspired Hex
Spell. Remove a hex from target ally and gain 4...9...10 Energy. For 20 seconds, Inspired Hex is replaced with the hex that was removed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Stoning
entries: Hurl a large stone at a creature, potentially knocking them {@condition prone} if they are weak.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d6} bludgeoning damage and if the target is {@condition weakness|GuildWars|weakened} is knocked {@condition prone}.
Stoning
Spell. Send out a large stone, striking target foe for 45...93...105 earth damage if it hits. If Stoning hits a foe suffering from Weakness, that foe is knocked down

components.m: a large rock

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Together as One!
entries: {@bold Elite}
Inspire your allies to deal more damage with attacks and regain health every turn.

Choose any number of friendly creatures that can hear you and are within 20-foot of you, or any beast which obey your verbal commands within range. For the duration, a target's weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d6} damage and at the start of each of a target's turns, a target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4}.
If a target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends on that target.
"Together as One!"
Elite Shout. For 3...13...15 seconds, all party members near you or near your pet deal +5...13...15 additional damage with attacks and gain +1...6...7 Health regeneration. PvE Skil

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for every two slot levels above 5th and the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Aura of the Lich
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Don the necrotic aura of a powerful lich, creating {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars|Bone Horrors} from all corpses in range and increasing the potency of your death magic spells.

Target each non-undead dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, within range. Exploit each target, turning them into a {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars}. Then create an additional {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} at your location.
A {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} remains for the duration or until it reaches zero hit points, at which point it will disintegrate into ash.

A {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} is friendly to you and your allies while you are conscious. If you fall {@condition unconscious}, a {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} becomes hostile towards everything. A {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. A {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} is in the DMs control.
For the duration, when you cast a death themed spell of 1st level or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting.
Aura of the Lich

Elite Enchantment Spell. All corpses within earshot are exploited and you animate a level 1...14...17 bone horror plus one for each corpse exploited in this way. For 5...37...45 seconds, your Death Magic attribute is increased by +1.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th or 8th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 9th level, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Echo
entries: {@bold Elite}
Create an echo of the next spell you cast, casting it twice in quick succession.
For the duration, the next time you finish casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, you cast that spell again (no action required), without expending a spell slot or requiring material components.
Echo
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, Echo is replaced with the next skill you use. Echo acts as this skill for 30 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number of casts increases by 1 for every two slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Ether Prodigy
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment},{@bold Overcast:} 5
Channel the latent energy of the ether into you, improving your spellcasting.
For the duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 1st level, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 9 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.
Ether Prodigy
Elite Enchantment Spell. Lose all enchantments. For 8...18...20 seconds, you gain +6 Energy regeneration. When Ether Prodigy ends, you lose 2 Health for each point of Energy you have.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Crippling Shot
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Unblockable}
Fire a shot attempting to cripple a creature.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and is {@condition crippled|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Crippling Shot
Elite Bow Attack. If Crippling Shot hits, your target becomes Crippled for 1...9...11 second[s]. This attack cannot be blocked.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Amity
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Magically convince a group of creatures to be pacifist, this lasts until a creature takes damage.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, regardless of a target's abilities or magic items, a target can't make melee or ranged weapon attacks.
When a target takes damage, this spell ends on that target.
Amity
Elite Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, adjacent foes cannot attack. For each foe, Amity ends if that foe takes damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Blood is Power
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}, {@bold Sacrifice:} 33%
Sacrifice some of your own blood to fuel a creature's spells.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the creature would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 3rd level or lower, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 15 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.
Blood is Power
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, target other ally gains +3...5...6 Energy regeneration.

components.m: a small knife

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number you need to roll decreases by 1 for every 2 slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Energy Drain
entries: {@bold Elite}
Siphon energy from a creature to gain it yourself.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 2d8}. On a successful save, the target's initiative gets reduced by half as much.
If this spell reduces the target's initiative, your initiative gets increased by thrice the initiative lost.
Energy Drain
Elite Spell. Target foe loses 2...8...9 Energy. You gain 3 Energy for each point of Energy lost.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ether Renewal
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Use the ether to heal yourself and improve your initiative per beneficial spell on you when casting a spell of 1st level or higher.

For the duration, when you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d6} per beneficial spell on you and your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d6} per beneficial spell on you.
Ether Renewal
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, each time you cast a spell, you gain 1...3...4 Energy and 5...17...20 Health for each enchantment on you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd and the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Escape
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Stance}
Become nimble, attempting to escape.
For the duration, your speed increases by 33%, and you have a +5 bonus to AC.
Escape
Elite Stance. For 1...7...8 second[s], you move 33% faster and have a 75% chance to block attacks.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Aura of Faith
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Sheath an ally in an aura of faith, reducing all damage they take and increasing the healing they receive.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 4d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, when the target regains hit points, they regain 50% more hit points.
Aura of Faith
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 3 seconds, target ally gains 50...90...100% more Health when healed and takes 5...41...50% less damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd and the % increases by 10% for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Feast of Corruption
entries: {@bold Elite}
Summon the ravenous maw of {@condition corruption|GuildWars}, feasting on everything in an area, damaging and potentially stealing health from everything in its maw.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d8} necrotic damage. If a target was under the effect of a detrimental spell, a target takes an additional {@damage 3d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of that necrotic damage dealt. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
Feast of Corruption
Elite Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 16...67...80 shadow damage. You steal up to 8...34...40 Health from each struck foe who is suffering from a hex.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Energy Surge
entries: {@bold Elite}
Make the energy in a group of creatures burn them up from the inside.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d6}.
If this spell reduces a target's initiative, a target takes 4 psychic damage per initiative lost. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
Energy Surge
Elite Spell. Target foe loses 1...8...10 Energy. For each point of Energy lost, that foe and all nearby foes take 9 damage.

spell.name: Glimmering Mark
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}, {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Inscribe a glimmering mark into the flesh of an enemy with lightning, damaging them and everyone around them every turn and inflicting blind.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, target each creature in a 10-foot-radius centered on the target. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d6} lightning damage and is {@condition blinded} for 1 round. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
If you target the creature with a spell, this spell ends.
Glimmering Mark

Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe and all foes adjacent to your target take 5...21...25 damage each second. Foes using attack skills are Blinded for 3 seconds. This hex ends if you use a skill that targets this foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Charge!
entries: {@bold Elite}
Shout "Charge!" to inspire your allies to move faster.
Target each friendly creature that can hear you within range. End the {@condition crippled|GuildWars} condition on a target and for the duration, a target's speed is increased by 33%.
"Charge!"
Elite Shout. Allies in earshot lose the Crippled condition. For 5...11...13 seconds, these allies move 33% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ferocious Strike
entries: {@bold Elite}
Command your pet to attempt a Ferocious Strike.

Choose one beast, which obeys your verbal commands, that can hear you within range. The beast uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the beast can see within the beast's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 4d6} damage you gain {@dice 1d4} strikes of adrenaline, and your initiative gets increased by {@dice 4d4}.
Ferocious Strike
Elite Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Ferocious Strike that deals +13...25...28 damage. If that attack hits, you gain adrenaline and 3...9...10 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Judgment Strike
entries: {@bold Elite}
Imbue your fist with holy might, to strike everyone around you.

Target each creature, other than you, that you can see within range. Make a melee spell attack against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 4d6} radiant damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Judgment Strike
Elite Melee Attack. Attack target and adjacent foes. Each attack that hits deals +13...27...30 Holy damage [sic] and knocks down attacking foes. PvE Skill

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Grenth's Balance
entries: {@bold Elite}
Invoke the judgement of the god of deat and balance out your health with a creature of your choice.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, if the target has more hit points than you do, you regain hit points equal to up to half the difference and the target takes necrotic damage equal to the amount of hit points you gained. On a successful save, you regain hit points equal to up to a quarter the difference, and the target takes necrotic damage equal to the amount of hit points you gained.
Grenth's Balance

Elite Spell. If target foe has more Health than you, you gain half the difference (up to your maximum Health), and that foe loses an equal amount. If this foe has less Health than you, you lose half the difference, and that foe gains an equal amount.

components.m: a small silver scale

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 9th level, the target makes its saving throw with disadvantage.

spell.name: Fevered Dreams
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Spin out your foes condition induced dreams, infecting creatures around them with conditions every time they suffer from a new one.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when the target gains a condition, target each creature other than the target in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature gains a copy of the condition gained if it's one of the following conditions: {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars},  {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Poisoned} and {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}.
Additionally, if the target is suffering from two or more conditions, the target is {@condition dazed|GuildWars} for 1 round.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Fevered Dreams

Elite Hex Spell. For 10...22...25 seconds, whenever target foe suffers from a new condition, all foes in the area suffer from that condition as well. If target foe has two or more conditions that foe is Dazed for 1...3...3 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Glyph of Energy
entries: Invoke the Glyph of Energy by drawing it into the air as a glowing symbol.

For the duration, when you cast a spell of 1st level or lower (except Glyph of Energy), the spell does not expend a spell slot, does not cause {@condition overcast|GuildWars}, and you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting. After this spell triggers {@dice 1d4 + 1} times, this spell ends.
Glyph of Energy
Elite Glyph. Your next 1...3...3 spell[s] do[es] not cause Overcast and cost[s] 10...22...25 less Energy to cast. Your elemental attributes are increased by 1...2...2.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Victory Is Mine!
entries: {@bold Elite}
Gloat over the suffering of a creature afflicted by multiple conditions, gaining health and initiative in the process.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. You regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier per condition on the target, and your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d4} per condition on the target.
"Victory Is Mine!"
Elite Shout. You gain 10...56...68 Health and 3...6...7 Energy for each condition suffered by target foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Greater Conflagration
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Summoning Ritual}
Call forth a spirit of fire, which converts all physical damage to fire damage.
Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit and takes bludgeoning, piercing or slashing damage, they take fire damage instead.
Greater Conflagration
Elite Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all physical damage is fire damage instead. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

components.m: a candle

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Life Barrier
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Create a divine barrier around a creature, permanently decreasing the damage they take.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 4d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
If you are below 50% of your maximum hit points, this spell ends.
Life Barrier

Elite Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, damage dealt to target other ally is reduced by 20...44...50%. If your Health is below 50% when that ally takes damage, Life Barrier ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Life Transfer
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Create a tether of life essence between you and a group of creatures, siphoning away their vitality.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of a target's turns, a target takes {@damage 2d6} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Life Transfer
Elite Hex Spell. For 6...11...12 seconds, target foe and adjacent foes suffer -3...7...8 Health degeneration, which you gain as Health regeneration.

spell.name: Illusionary Weaponry
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Conjure up an Illusionary Sword for the duration.

This magic sword lasts until the spell ends. It counts as a simple melee weapon with which you are proficient. It deals {@damage 2d8} psychic damage on a hit or miss, cannot critical hit and has the finesse and light property.

While wielding at least one sword conjured by this spell, when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} for every two illusion themed spells you have prepared and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
You can conjure up to two swords, which can only be wielded by you.
Illusionary Weaponry

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, your melee attacks neither hit nor fail to hit. Instead, Illusionary Weaponry deals 8...34...40 damage to your targets for each melee attack. You have +5 armor for each equipped Illusion Magic skill.

components.m: a sword hilt

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a 4th- or 5th-level spell slot, the damage increases to {@dice 3d8}. When you cast it using a 6th- or 7th-level spell slot, the damage increases to {@dice 4d8}. When you cast it using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the damage increases to {@dice 5d8}.

spell.name: Glyph of Renewal
entries: {@bold Elite}
Etch a glyph of renewal into the air, causing your next spell slot to come back quicker.
For the duration, the next time you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, the spell slot expended in that casting is regained when you finish a short rest instead of a long rest.
Glyph of Renewal
Elite Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next spell instantly recharges.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Battle Rage
entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 4, {@bold Elite}, {@bold Stance}
Enter a battle rage, moving faster and generating adrenaline.
For the duration, your speed is increased by 33%, and you gain one strike of adrenaline when you hit with a weapon attack.
Battle Rage
Elite Stance. For 5...17...20 seconds, you move 33% faster and gain double adrenaline from attacks. Battle Rage ends if you use any non-adrenal skills.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Incendiary Arrows
entries: {@bold Elite}
Fire multiple {@condition burning|GuildWars} arrows at a group of creatures.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Target up to three creatures in a 15-foot-radius centered on the target. Make a ranged weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and starts {@condition burning|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Incendiary Arrows
Elite Bow Attack. Shoot arrows at target foe and up to 2 foes near your target. Those foes are set on fire for 1...3...3 second[s].

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage of the {@condition burning|GuildWars} condition increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Mark of Protection
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Inscribe the mark of protection on an ally, converting all damage they take into healing.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, the target instead regains hit points equal to the damage they would have taken (maximum 5).
You cannot cast spells until the end of your next turn.
Mark of Protection

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target ally would take damage, that ally is healed for that amount instead, maximum 6...49...60. All your Protection Prayers are disabled for 5 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the maximum increases by 5 for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Offering of Blood
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Sacrifice:} 20%
Offer your blood in a ritual to gain more magical power.
For the duration, when you cast a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell does not expend a spell slot. After this spell triggers {@dice 2d4} times, this spell ends.
Offering of Blood
Elite Spell. You gain 8...18...20 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for every three slot levels above 3rd.

spell.name: Ineptitude
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Create illusory arcane interference in the mind of a group of creatures, causing them damage and blindness the next time they attack.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the next time a target is about to make an attack roll, a target takes {@damage 4d6} psychic damage and is {@condition blinded} for 1 minute.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Ineptitude
Elite Hex Spell. For 4 seconds, the next time target foe or any adjacent foe attacks, they take 30...114...135 damage and are Blinded for 10 seconds.

components.m: a pinch of sand

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Mind Burn
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Overcast:} 2
Use the power of your mind to sear a group of enemies, inflicting more damage and {@condition burning|GuildWars} if you have a higher initiative than them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d6} fire damage and if a target has a lower initiative than you, they take an additional {@damage 2d6} fire damage and start {@condition burning|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d4} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Mind Burn

Elite Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes take 15...51...60 fire damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe and all adjacent foes take an additional 15...51...60 fire damage and are set on fire for 1...8...10 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the fire damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st and the damage of the {@condition burning|GuildWars} condition increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Mind Freeze
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}, {@bold Overcast:} 2
Use the power of your mind to freeze a group of enemies, inflicting more damage and slowing them down if you have a higher initiative than them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d6} cold damage and if a target has a lower initiative than you, they take an additional {@damage 3d6} cold damage and their speed is reduced by 90% to a minimum of 5 feet for the duration. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
Mind Freeze

Elite Hex Spell. Target foe takes 10...50...60 cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers an additional 10...50...60 cold damage and moves 90% slower for 1...4...5 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Mind Shock
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Overcast:} 2
Use the power of your mind to shock a group of enemies, inflicting more damage and knocking them {@condition prone} if you have a higher initiative than them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d6} lightning damage and if a target has a lower initiative than you, they take an additional {@damage 3d6} lightning damage and are knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
{@bold Armor Penetration.} This spell's lightning damage cannot be reduced in any way, except by immunities.
Mind Shock

Elite Spell. Target foe suffers 10...42...50 lightning damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers 10...42...50 more lightning damage and is knocked down. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Cleave

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 4, {@bold Elite}
Enhance your weapon with powerful magic.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d8} damage.
Cleave
Elite Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...26...30 damage.

spell.name: Marksman's Wager
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Preparation}
You make a wager with the spirit of the hunt, rewarding you with initiative every time you hit with a ranged weapon attack, but loosing initiative when missing.
For the duration, when you hit with a ranged weapon attack, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d8}, but when you miss with a ranged weapon attack, your initiative gets reduced by {@dice 2d8}.
Marksman's Wager
Elite Preparation. For 18 seconds, you gain 5...9...10 Energy whenever your arrows hit, but lose 10 Energy whenever your arrows fail to strike.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Martyr
entries: {@bold Elite}
Martyr yourself by transferring all conditions on allies to yourself.

Target each friendly creature other than you within range. You gain a copy of each of the following conditions on a target: {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars},  {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Poisoned} and {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}. End all copied conditions on a target.
Martyr
Elite Spell. Transfer all conditions and their remaining durations from your allies to you.

spell.name: Order of the Vampire
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}, {@bold Order}, {@bold Sacrifice:} 17%
Induct your allies into the Order of the Vampire, giving their attacks life steal.

Target each friendly creature within range. For the duration, a target's weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage and a target regains hit points equal to the amount of that necrotic damage dealt.
Order of the Vampire

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, whenever a party member who is not under the effects of another Necromancer enchantment hits a foe with physical damage, that party member steals up to 3...13...16 Health.

components.m: a sharpened tooth

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Defy Pain
entries: {@bold Adrenaline} 5, {@bold Elite}
Make yourself numb to pain for a short duration.

For the duration, your hit point maximum and current hit points increase by {@dice 3d10} + Constitution modifier and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Defy Pain
Elite Skill. For 20 seconds you have an additional 90...258...300 Health, an additional 20 armor, and you take -1...8...10 less damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, your hit points increase by an additional {@dice 2d10} for each slot level above 2nd and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Devastating Hammer

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 7, {@bold Elite}
Channel your adrenaline into a Devastating Bash, knocking your target {@condition prone} and inflicting {@condition weakness|GuildWars}.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d10} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone} and suffers from {@condition weakness|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Devastating Hammer
Elite Hammer Attack. If Devastating Hammer hits, your target is knocked down and suffers from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds.
