spell.name: Melandru's Arrows
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Preparation}
Sheath your arrows in Melandru's wild magic, making them inflict bleed and deal extra damage against enchanted foes.

For the duration, when you hit a target with a ranged weapon attack, they must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 2d4} damage. Additionally, if a target is under the effect of a beneficial spell, they take {@damage 2d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Melandru's Arrows
Elite Preparation. For 18 seconds, whenever your arrows hit, they cause Bleeding for 3...21...25 seconds, and if they hit a target who is under an enchantment, they do +8...24...28 damage.

components.m: a hand full of sharp rocks

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd and the damage of the {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} condition increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Peace and Harmony
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Invoke peace and harmony on a creature, removing negative effects and reducing their duration.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. End the latest two of the following conditions on the target: {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars},  {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Poisoned} or {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}. Additionally, the latest two harmful spells on the target end.
For the duration, conditions and harmful spells expire 90% faster on the target.
Peace and Harmony

Elite Enchantment Spell. Target ally loses 0...7...9 condition[s] and hex[es]. For 1...3...3 second[s], conditions and hexes expire 90% faster on that ally. All your Smiting Prayers are disabled for 20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, one additional spell and condition ends for each slot level above 2nd and the duration increases by 1 round for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Plague Signet
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Signet:} Short Rest
Activate your Plague Signet to transfer most of your conditions to an enemy.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. The target gains a copy of each of the following conditions on yourself: {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars},  {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Poisoned} and {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}. End all copied conditions on yourself.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Plague Signet
Elite Signet. Transfer all negative conditions with 100...180...200% of their remaining durations from yourself to target foe. (50% failure chance with Curses 4 or less.)

spell.name: Dwarven Battle Stance
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Stance}
Channel the ancient fighting style of the dwarfs, gaining an additional attack, taking less damage and disrupting foes with your attack as long as you are using a heavy weapon.

For the duration, if you are wielding a melee weapon with the heavy property, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn, when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 4d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage, and when you hit a target with a melee weapon attack, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target can't cast spells or use abilities until the end of their next turn.
Dwarven Battle Stance
Elite Stance. For 5...10...11 seconds, if you are wielding a hammer, you attack 33% faster, you gain +40 armor, and your attack skills interrupt foes when they hit.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the heavy property

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Melandru's Resilience
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Stance}
Channel the nature goddess Melandru, reinforcing yourself with rejuvenating vines, healing every turn and potentially reducing your spell cost for each condition or hex affecting you.

For the duration, at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} per condition or harmful spell affecting you. Additionally, while at least suffering from one condition or harmful spell, when you would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 1st level, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 19 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot. Reduce the number you need to roll by 1 for each condition or harmful spell affecting you beyond the first, to a minimum of 10.
If you drop to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Melandru's Resilience
Elite Stance. For 8...18...20 seconds, you gain +4 Health regeneration and +1 Energy regeneration for each condition and hex you are suffering.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Restore Condition
entries: {@bold Elite}
Purge most conditions on a creature and heal them for each condition removed.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. End {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars},  {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Poisoned} and {@condition Weakness|GuildWars} on the target and the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} per condition removed.
Restore Condition

Elite Spell. Remove all conditions (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, and Deep Wound) from target other ally. For each condition removed, that ally is healed for 10...58...70 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Soul Leech
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Attach a soul leech to a creature, siphoning off health every time they cast a spell.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when the target casts a spell of 1st level or higher, the target takes {@damage 1d10} necrotic damage per spell slot level, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the final damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.
Soul Leech
Elite Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell, you steal up to 16...67...80 Health from that foe.

spell.name: Mantra of Recall
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Chant a mantra of recall, potentially regaining spend spell slots at the end of it.
For the duration, when you expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 3rd level or lower, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 15 or higher, you regain that spell slot when this spell ends.
Mantra of Recall
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 20 seconds, you gain no benefit from it. You gain 10...22...25 Energy when Mantra of Recall ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Mist Form
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Partially turn your body into mist, taking less damage from foes affected by water themed spells and healing all allies around you when casting an elemental spell.

For the duration, when you take damage from an enemy affected by one or more harmful water themed spells, you can roll {@dice 4d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, when you cast an elemental themed spell of 1st level or higher, choose any number of friendly creatures within 150-feet of you. A target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} per spell slot level.
Mist Form

Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10...38...45 seconds, you take 33% less damage from foes under the effects of Water Magic hexes. Whenever you cast an elemental spell, all non-spirit allies in earshot are healed for 50...210...250% of the Energy cost of the spell.

components.m: a bottle of captured mist

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 4th and the final healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Earth Shaker

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 8, {@bold Elite}
Jump up into the air, shattering the earth around your target, knocking creatures {@condition prone} around them.

Target each creature other than you in a 5-foot-radius centered on the target. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@dice 1d4} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Earth Shaker
Elite Hammer Attack. Target foe and all adjacent foes are knocked down. (50% failure chance with Hammer Mastery 4 or less.)

spell.name: Oath Shot
entries: {@bold Elite}
Fire an all or nothing shot, which allows you to immediately cast another spell on a hit, but prevents you from using spells or abilities on a miss.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, and you can immediately cast another spell without requiring an action.
On a miss, you cannot cast spells or use abilities until the end of your next turn.
Oath Shot

Elite Bow Attack. If Oath Shot hits, all of your skills except Oath Shot are recharged. If it misses, all of your skills are disabled for 10...5...4 seconds. (50% miss chance with Expertise 7 or less.)

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Shield of Regeneration
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Conjure a magical shield, which heals a creature every turn and reduces all damage they take.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} and when the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.
Shield of Regeneration
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...11...13 seconds, target ally gains +3...9...10 Health regeneration and 40 armor.

spell.name: Soul Taker
entries: {@bold Elite}
Make your attacks rip the souls out of your foes body, dealing more damage but also hurting you every time you attack.
For the duration, when you make an attack with a weapon, you loose health equal to {@dice 2d4}. Additionally, your weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 4d6} necrotic damage.
Soul Taker
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 3...25...30 seconds, your attacks sacrifice 15...19...20 health and deal 15...19...20 more damage. PvE Skill

components.m: a small clouded pearl

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the additional weapon damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Mantra of Recovery
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Stance}
Start chanting a mantra of recovery, allowing you to cast multiple spells per turn.
For the duration, you can cast spells as an action, even if you already cast a spell as a bonus action on your turn.
Mantra of Recovery
Elite Stance. For 5...17...20 seconds, spells you cast recharge 33% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Obsidian Flesh
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Partially turn your flesh into obsidian, reducing the damage you take, making you non-targetable by spells but preventing you from attacking and reducing your ability to cast spells.

For the duration, you cannot be targeted by hostile spells and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, regardless of your abilities or magic items, you can't make melee or ranged weapon attacks.

{@bold Bond.} For the duration, your spell save DC and spell attack bonus are reduced by 2.  You can have a maximum number of bonds active at any one time, equal to your spell casting ability modifier (minimum 1). The bond ends if the target of your bond is ever not within 300 feet of you, or you fall {@condition unconscious}. You can end a bond at any time (no action required).
Obsidian Flesh
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, you gain +20 armor and cannot be the target of enemy spells, but cannot attack and have -2 energy degeneration.

components.m: a shard of obsidian

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Flourish
entries: {@bold Elite}
Perform a magical flourish, allowing you to immediately afterward cast an attack spell.
Cast any non-elite spell which requires a weapon attack roll, which is of a level equal or lower than this one, ignoring requirements, casting time and components.
Flourish
Elite Skill. All of your attack skills become recharged. You gain 2...6...7 Energy for each skill recharged by Flourish.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the level of the spell increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Poison Arrow
entries: {@bold Elite}
Attempt to poison and corrupt a creature, by hitting them with a {@condition poisoned} tipped arrow.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition poisoned} and {@condition corruption|GuildWars|corrupted} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Poison Arrow
Elite Bow Attack. If Poison Arrow hits, your target becomes Poisoned for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

spell.name: Spiteful Spirit
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Utter a spiteful curse, hexing a target to damage everything around them every time they attack or cast a spell.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when the target casts a spell or makes an attack roll, target each creature in a 10-foot-radius centered on the target. Each target takes {@damage 3d10} necrotic damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 3rd.
Spiteful Spirit
Elite Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, whenever target foe attacks or uses a skill, Spiteful Spirit deals 5...29...35 shadow damage to that foe and all adjacent allies of that foe.

spell.name: Migraine
entries: {@bold Elite} , {@bold Hex}
Drive a psychic spike into a creature's mind, causing a horrible migraine, dealing damage every turn and increasing their casting times.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, regardless of the target's abilities or magic items, the target can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn and at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 6d6} psychic damage. Additionally, the target can't cast spells as reactions, must cast spells which take a bonus action as an action, and any other spell takes twice as long to cast.
Migraine
Elite Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, target foe suffers -1...7...8 Health degeneration and takes 100% longer to activate skills.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Over the Limit
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Push your spellcasting over the limit.

For the duration, you can cast spells as an action, even if you already cast a spell as a bonus action on your turn, and you can cast spells which take an action to cast as a bonus action, but any spell you cast causes you to gain 2 rounds of {@condition overcast|GuildWars}.
Over the Limit
Elite Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, your spells cast 15...19...20% faster, and recharge 15...43...50% faster, but you continuously gain Overcast. PvE Skill

spell.name: Gladiator's Defense
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Stance}
Assume the fighting stance of a gladiator, gaining AC and striking back at foes who miss.

For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC against weapon attacks and if a melee attack misses you because of this bonus, target the creature that attacked you. The target takes {@damage 3d6} slashing damage.
Gladiator's Defense
Elite Stance. For 5...10...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block incoming attacks. Whenever you block a melee attack this way, the attacker suffers 5...29...35 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Practiced Stance
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Stance}
Assume a stance practiced at applying preparations.

For the duration, when you cast a preparation spell, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting, cast it as a bonus action and double its duration.
Practiced Stance
Elite Stance. For 20...32...35 seconds, your Preparations recharge 50% faster and last 30...126...150% longer.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the level of the spell slot increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Spell Breaker
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Put a magical ward on a creature, breaking any spells attempting to target them.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target cannot be targeted by hostile spells.
Spell Breaker
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...15...17 seconds, target ally cannot be the target of enemy spells.

components.m: a piece of lead

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 9th level, the duration increases by 1 round.

spell.name: Tainted Flesh
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Taint the flash of a friendly creature, making them immune to diseases and causing {@condition disease|GuildWars} to any creature who attacks them in melee.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. End the {@condition disease|GuildWars|diseased} condition on the target. For the duration, the target is immune to the {@condition disease|GuildWars|diseased} condition and when the target takes damage from a melee attack, target the creature that dealt the damage. The new target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition disease|GuildWars|diseased} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Tainted Flesh
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 20...39...44 seconds, target ally is immune to disease, and anyone striking that ally in melee becomes Diseased for 3...13...15 seconds.

components.m: a piece of demonic flesh

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st, and you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Panic
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Spread panic throughout a group, preventing each other from casting spells or using abilities.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, when a target finishes casting a spell or successfully uses an ability, target each hostile creature other than the target in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a target can't cast spells or use abilities on their next turn.
Panic
Elite Hex Spell. For 1...8...10 second[s], target foe and all nearby foes are hexed with Panic. When a foe hexed with Panic successfully uses a skill, all other nearby foes are interrupted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Thunderclap (Guild Wars)
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}, {@bold Elite}
Cause a massive thunderclap at a location of your choice, disrupting and damaging foes.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d6} lightning damage, {@damage 3d6} thunder damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.

On a failed Constitution save, a target is {@condition weakness|GuildWars|weakened} and has {@condition cracked armor|GuildWars} for the duration, and can't cast spells or use abilities on their next turn.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Thunderclap

Elite Spell. Create a massive shockwave at target foe's location. Deals 10...42...50 lightning damage to target and all adjacent foes. Struck foes are interrupted and suffer from Cracked Armor and Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Punishing Shot

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: {@bold Elite}
You punish a creature in the process of using an ability or casting a spell.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d8} damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ability/spell fails and has no effect.
Punishing Shot
Elite Bow Attack. If Punishing Shot hits, you strike for +10...18...20 damage and your target is interrupted.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Hundred Blades
entries: {@bold Elite}
Quickly flourish your blade when attacking, damaging everyone around you.

For the duration, if you are wielding a melee weapon which deals slashing damage, when you make a melee weapon attack roll, target each creature other than you within 5-feet. A target takes {@damage 1d6} slashing damage.
Hundred Blades
Elite Skill. For 15 seconds, whenever you attack with a sword, all adjacent foes take 10...22...25 slashing damage.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp which deals slashing damage

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Unyielding Aura
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}
Envelop yourself in an unyielding aura, which makes all your spells heal for more and resurrects on end.
For the duration, when you cast a spell that restores hit points, you can roll {@dice 4d4} and add the number rolled to the amount of hit points restored.

When this spell ends, randomly choose one friendly creature, which has not been dead for more than 1 minute, that you can see within range. The target returns to life with 100% of their maximum hit points and teleports within 5 feet of you in an unoccupied space.
Unyielding Aura

Elite Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, your Monk spells heal for +15...51...60% more Health. When this enchantment ends one random other party member is resurrected with full Health and Energy and teleported to your location.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Well of Power
entries: {@bold Elite}
Extract the remaining magic of a corpse, healing allies in its area every turn, and empowering their magic.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, for the duration, each friendly creature in a 20-foot-radius centered on that point regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. Additionally, when a friendly creature casts a spell while inside the spell's area, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 16 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.
Well of Power

Elite Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Power at that location. For 8...18...20 seconds, allies within the area of Well of Power gain +1...5...6 Health regeneration and +2 Energy regeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 2nd and the number you need to roll decreases by 1 for every 2 slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Signet of Midnight
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Signet:} Short Rest
Touch a creature, plunging you both into midnight, blinding you both.
You touch a creature. The target and you are {@condition blinded} for the duration.
Signet of Midnight
Elite Signet. You and target touched foe become Blinded for 15 seconds.

spell.name: Ward Against Harm
entries: {@bold Elite}
Conjure a watery ward at your location, protecting your allies from damage and healing them every turn.

Conjure a 20-foot radius stationary ward at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. When a target takes acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, if the target is in the radius of the spell, you can roll {@dice 2d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Additionally, when a target takes damage, if the target is in the radius of the spell, you can roll {@dice 2d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Also, each friendly creature regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier when it enters the ward's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there.
Ward Against Harm

Elite Ward Spell. Create a Ward Against Harm at this location. For 5...13...15 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area have +1...3...3 health regeneration, +12...22...24 armor, and an additional +12...22...24 armor against elemental damage. This spell is disabled for 20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd and the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Seven Weapons Stance
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Stance}
Gain mastery over all weapons.
For the duration, the number you need to roll to score a critical hit is reduced by 5, and you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn.
Seven Weapons Stance
Elite Stance. For 3...17...20 seconds, your weapon attributes are increased by +1...12...15 and you attack 33% faster. PvE Skill

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Spike Trap
entries: {@bold Elite}
Prepare a spike trap, which damages, cripples and knocks creatures {@condition prone} which trigger it.

Conjure a 15-foot radius stationary {@condition invisible} trap at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. The next time a non-chosen creature enters the spell's area, the trap triggers, applying the following effects for 2 rounds:

Each non-chosen creature must make a Dexterity saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d8} piercing damage, becomes {@condition crippled|GuildWars} for one minute and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Spike Trap

Elite Trap. When Spike Trap is triggered, every second (for 2 seconds), all nearby foes are struck for 10...34...40 piercing damage, become Crippled for 3...21...25 seconds, and are knocked down. Spike Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.

components.m: a bundle of sharp sticks

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Word of Healing
entries: {@bold Elite}
Utter a Word of healing, which heals low health creatures for more.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier. If the target was below 50% of their maximum hit points, they regain additional hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing each increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Word of Healing
Elite Spell. Heal target ally for 5...81...100 Health. Heal for an additional 30...98...115 Health if that ally is below 50% Health.

spell.name: Wither
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Hex}
Curse a creature's flesh to wither, dealing damage to them every turn and reducing their spellcasting ability.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 1d10} necrotic damage. Additionally, for the duration, when the target expends a spell slot to cast a spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 10 or lower, the spell expends an additional spell slot. If an additional spell slot is expended this way, this spell ends and the target takes {@damage 2d10} necrotic damage.
Wither

Elite Hex Spell. For 5...29...35 seconds, target foe suffers -2...4...4 Health degeneration and -1 Energy degeneration. If target foe's Energy reaches 0, that foe takes 15...63...75 damage and Wither ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Time Ward
entries: {@bold Elite}
Create a pocket of space where time passes differently for allies inside it.

Conjure a 20-foot radius stationary ward at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. For the duration, if a target is in the radius of the spell, they can cast spells as an action, even if they already cast a spell as a bonus action on their turn, and a target can cast spells which take an action to cast as a bonus action.
Time Ward
Elite Ward Spell. You create a Time Ward at your location. For 3...13...15 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area cast spells 15...19...20% faster and recharge skills 15...19...20% faster. PvE Skill

components.m: a broken clock

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 9th level, the duration increases to 1 hour.

spell.name: Water Trident
entries: {@bold Elite}
Conjure up a watery trident and throw it at up to three creatures, knocking {@condition prone} moving targets.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Target up to two other creatures other than the target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Make a ranged spell attack with advantage against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 2d6} cold damage and, if a target willingly moved on its last turn, must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Water Trident
Elite Spell. Send out a fast-moving Water Trident, striking target foe and up to 2 adjacent foes for 10...74...90 cold damage if it hits. If it hits a moving foe, that foe is knocked down.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Shadow Theft
entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Enchantment}, {@bold Hex}, {@bold Lead Attack}
Shadow step to a creature, draining their power and empowering your own.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Teleport within 5 feet of the target to an unoccupied space. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, each of the target's ability scores are reduced by {@dice 1d4} each, and each of yours are increased correspondingly by the amount lost.
Shadow Theft

Elite Skill. Shadow Step to target foe. For 5...17...20 seconds that foe's attributes are reduced by 1...4...5 and your attributes are increased by 1...4...5. This skill counts as a Lead Attack. PvE Skill

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the range of the spell increases by 45 feet for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Signet of Judgment

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range make an attack roll

entries: {@bold Elite}, {@bold Signet:} Short Rest
You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of making an attack roll and smite all creatures around it.

Choose one attacking creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}, the attack roll misses and target each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. A target takes {@damage 3d8} radiant damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
Signet of Judgment
Elite Signet. Target foe is knocked down. That foe and all adjacent foes take 15...63...75 holy damage.

spell.name: Mend Ailment
entries: Magically cure a condition from a creature, healing them for every condition remaining on them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. End the latest of the following conditions on the target: {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars},  {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Poisoned} or {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}. Then the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} per condition affecting it.
Mend Ailment

Spell. Remove one condition (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, or Deep Wound) from target ally. For each remaining Condition, that ally is healed for 5...57...70 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Glyph of Concentration
entries: Inscribe a glyph of {@status concentration} into your spellcasting focus, improving the next {@status concentration} spell you cast.

For the duration, the next time you cast a {@status concentration}, enchantment or hex spell, you cannot be interrupted while casting it, you have a +5 bonus to Constitution saving throws made to hold {@status concentration} on that spell, and you ignore the {@condition dazed|GuildWars} condition for the casting of that spell.
Glyph of Concentration
Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next 1 spell cannot be interrupted and ignores the effects of being Dazed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Bull's Strike
entries: Attempt a bull's strike, knocking {@condition prone} moving foes.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and if the target willingly moved on its last turn, the target takes an additional {@damage 2d8} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Bull's Strike
Melee Attack. If this attack hits a moving foe, you strike for +5...25...30 damage, and your target is knocked down.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Plague Touch
entries: Touch a creature with plague infested hands, transferring conditions.

Choose one creature within range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target gains a copy of the latest {@dice 1d4} of the following conditions on yourself: {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars},  {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Poisoned} or {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}. End all copied conditions on yourself.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Plague Touch
Skill. Transfer 1...3...3 negative condition[s] and [its/their] remaining duration[s] from yourself to target touched foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, copy {@dice 1d4} additional conditions for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Griffon's Sweep
entries: Channel the power of the griffon, dive attacking, knocking {@condition prone} and damaging even on a miss.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d8} damage.
On a miss, the target takes {@damage 2d8} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Griffon's Sweep
Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. If this attack is blocked, your target is knocked down and suffers 10...29...34 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 3rd.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

spell.name: Final Thrust

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 10
Deliver a final powerful thrust, loosing all adrenaline and finishing off low health creatures.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 4d8} damage. If the target was below 50% of their maximum hit points, the target takes an additional {@damage 6d8} damage.
You lose all adrenaline.
Final Thrust
Sword Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If Final Thrust hits, you deal 1...32...40 more damage. This damage is doubled if your target was below 50% Health.

spell.name: Balanced Stance
entries: {@bold Stance}
Perfectly balance yourself, gaining immunity to being knocked {@condition prone} and not tacking extra damage from critical hits.
For the duration, you are immune to the {@condition prone} condition, and you do not take extra damage from critical hits.
Balanced Stance
Stance. For 8...18...20 seconds, you cannot be knocked down and you do not suffer extra damage from a critical attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Apply Poison
entries: {@bold Preparation}
Sheath your arrows in {@condition corruption|GuildWars} frog venom, making them inflict {@condition corruption|GuildWars} on a hit.

For the duration, when you hit a target with a ranged weapon attack, they must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition corruption|GuildWars|corrupted} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 2d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Apply Poison
Preparation. For 24 seconds, foes struck by your physical attacks become Poisoned for 3...13...15 seconds.

components.m: a vial of frog venom

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage of the corrupted condition increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Arcane Echo
entries: Create an arcane echo of the next spell you cast, casting it twice in quick succession.
For the duration, the next time you finish casting a spell of 2nd level or lower, you cast that spell again (no action required), without expending a spell slot or requiring material components.
Arcane Echo
Enchantment Spell. If you cast a spell in the next 20 seconds, Arcane Echo is replaced with that spell for 20 seconds. Arcane Echo ends prematurely if you use a non-spell skill.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number of casts increases by 1 for every three slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Dwayna's Kiss
entries: Send a prayer to Dwayna, goddess of light and life, to restore health to a creature, increasing for each spell on them.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier{@dice  + 1d6} per spell on the target.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the base healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Dwayna's Kiss
Spell. Heal target other ally for 15...51...60 Health and an additional 10...30...35 Health for each enchantment or hex on that ally.

spell.name: Rush
entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 4, {@bold Stance}
Channel your adrenaline into increasing your movement speed.
For the duration, your speed is increased by 30%.
Rush
Stance. For 8...18...20 seconds, you move 25% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the % increases by 10% for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blood of the Master
entries: {@bold Sacrifice:} 5% + 2% per undead minion chosen by you
Sacrifice your own blood for each undead minion you control, healing them.

Choose any number of friendly undead creatures, which have been created by a spell or an ability, that you can see. Each target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Blood of the Master
Spell. All of your undead allies are healed for 30...99...116 Health. You sacrifice an additional 2% maximum Health per minion healed in this way.

components.m: a drop of blood

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Holy Veil
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Enchantment}
Conjure up a holy veil around a creature, obscuring them from harmful spells.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration If the target is the target of a harmful spell which requires {@status concentration} or is an Enchantment/Hex, that spell requires twice as long to cast.
When this spell ends, the latest harmful spell on the target ends.
Holy Veil
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, any hex cast on target ally takes twice as long to cast. When Holy Veil ends, one hex is removed from target ally.

components.m: a veil and a drop of holy water

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Bestial Pounce
entries: Command your pet to attempt a Bestial Pounce, knocking down creatures who cast a spell on their last turn.

Choose one beast, which obeys your verbal commands, that can hear you within range. The beast uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the beast can see within the beast's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d6} damage and, if the target cast a spell on its last turn, the target must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}
Bestial Pounce
Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Bestial Pounce that deals +5...17...20 damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is casting a spell, that foe is knocked down.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Fertile Season
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Summon a nature spirit of the fertile season, improving health and reducing damage take for anyone affected.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit, the creature's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 10 and when a creature takes damage, you roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Fertile Season
Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within range have +50...130...150 maximum Health and gain +8 armor. This spirit dies after 15...39...45 seconds.

components.m: freshly cut grass

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, a creature's hit points increase by an additional 5 for each slot level above 2nd and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Precision Shot
entries: {@bold Unblockable}
Fire an extremely precise shot, which deals more damage on a hit and ignores any temporary AC bonuses.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d8} damage.
Precision Shot
Bow Attack. If Precision Shot hits, you strike for +3...9...10 damage. Precision Shot cannot be blocked. This action is easily interrupted.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Tiger's Fury
entries: {@bold Stance}
Invoke the great spirit of the tiger, entering a fury in which you can attack more often but cannot cast any spells.
For the duration, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn, but you cannot cast spells.
Tiger's Fury
Stance. All your non-attack skills are disabled for 5 seconds. For 5...10...11 seconds, you attack 25% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blood Ritual
entries: {@bold Enchantment}, {@bold Sacrifice:} 17%
Sacrifice some of your own blood to fuel another creature's spells.

You touch a creature, other than yourself. For the duration, when the creature would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 1st level, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 17 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.
Blood Ritual
Enchantment Spell. For 8...13...14 seconds, target touched ally gains +3 Energy regeneration. Blood Ritual cannot be used on the caster.

components.m: a small knife

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Cry of Frustration

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: Unleash a psychic scream, disrupting a group of creatures.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range. Target each creature other than you in a 15-foot-radius centered on the target.  Each target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower or using an ability, the spell/ability fails and has no effect. Otherwise, on a failed save, a target can't cast spells or use abilities until the end of their next turn.

If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, a target must make an Intelligence saving throw with disadvantage. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d6} psychic damage. If you did not successfully interrupt a spell this way, a creature makes the saving throw with advantage.
Cry of Frustration
Spell. If target foe is using a skill, that foe and all foes in the area are interrupted and suffer 15...63...75 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the interrupted spell has no effect if its level is less than or equal to the level of the spell slot you used - 1 and the the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Dark Aura
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Surround a creature with an ominous aura, which lashes out at creatures around it as they sacrifice health, fueled by your blood.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target loses health as part of their own spell effect, except by taking damage, target each creature other than the target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target takes {@damage 4d6} necrotic damage, and you lose health equal to {@dice 1d6}, which cannot trigger Dark Aura.
Dark Aura
Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, whenever target ally sacrifices Health, Dark Aura deals 5...41...50 shadow damage to adjacent foes, and you lose 5...17...20 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 4th and the health loss increases by {@dice 1d6} for every two slot levels above 4th.

spell.name: Armor of Frost
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Conjure up a suit of frost armor around you, encasing you in protective ice that also improves your water magic.

For the duration, when you cast a water themed spell of 1st level or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting. Additionally, when you take bludgeoning, piercing or slashing damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Armor of Frost
Enchantment Spell. For 10...29...34 seconds, you gain +40 armor against physical damage and have +1 Water Magic.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Maelstrom (Guild Wars)
entries: {@bold Overcast:} 5
Conjure a maelstrom, which crushes and disrupts everything trapped inside its maw.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 10-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d6} cold damage and  can't cast spells on their next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
Maelstrom
Spell. Create a Maelstrom at target foe's location. For 10 seconds, foes adjacent to that area are struck for 10...22...25 cold damage each second. Maelstrom interrupts spell-casting when it hits.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Spirit of Failure
entries: {@bold Hex}
Create an illusion in a creature's mind, instilling them with an intense feeling of failure, making them more likely to miss with attacks and improving your initiative every time they do so.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when the target makes an attack roll with a weapon, they must roll a {@dice d20}. On a 5 or lower, the attack misses. Additionally, if the target misses with a weapon attack, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d4}.
Spirit of Failure
Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe has a 25% chance to miss with attacks. You gain 1...3...3 Energy whenever that foe fails to hit in combat.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Illusion of Weakness
entries: {@bold Enchantment:} You cannot choose to end {@status concentration} on this spell.
{@bold Sacrifice:} You can choose to lose up to a maximum of 20 hit points.
Create an illusion of {@condition weakness|GuildWars}, tricking your opponents into thinking you are weaker than you appear.
For the duration, if you are below 25% of your maximum hit points, this spell ends.
When this spell ends, you regain hit points equal to the health lost.
If you drop to 0 hit points, this spell ends without healing you.
Illusion of Weakness
Enchantment Spell. You lose 50...202...240 Health. Illusion of Weakness ends if damage drops your Health below 25% of your maximum. When Illusion of Weakness ends, you gain 50...202...240 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the maximum increases by 10 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Enfeeble
entries: Utter an enfeebling curse, {@condition weakness|GuildWars|weakening} a creature.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition weakness|GuildWars|weakened} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
The amount of targets you can target with this spell increases by 1 when you reach 5th level (2), 11th level (3), and 17th level (4).
Enfeeble
Spell. Target suffers from Weakness for 10...26...30 seconds.

spell.name: Leech Signet

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: {@bold Signet:} Short Rest
You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell or using an ability, and drain their energy on successfully interrupting a spell.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower or using an ability, the spell/ability fails and has no effect.
If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d4}.
Leech Signet
Signet. Interrupt target foe's action. If that action was a spell, you gain 3...13...15 Energy.

spell.name: Holy Wrath
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Give a creature a blessing of divine retribution, reflecting back attack damage on any who dare attack them.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage from a weapon attack, target the creature that dealt the damage. The new target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the new target takes 66% of the damage they dealt as radiant damage (minimum 1, maximum 20). On a successful save, the new target takes half as much damage.
After this spell triggers {@dice 1d4} times on the target, this spell ends.
Holy Wrath
Enchantment Spell. For 10...26...30 seconds, the next 1...8...10 time[s] target other ally takes attack damage, this spell deals 66% of the damage back to the source (maximum of 5...41...50 damage).

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage maximum increases by 10 for each slot level above 2nd and the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Malign Intervention
entries: {@bold Hex}
Put a curse of undeath on a creature, reducing their healing and animating them as a masterless {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} if they die.

Choose one non-undead creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, when the target regains hit points, they regain 20% less hit points.

If the target dies, a {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} is created at the target's location. The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} acts on the target's initiative, is hostile towards everything, and is in the DMs control.
The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} remains for the duration or until it reaches zero hit points, at which point it will disintegrate into ash.
Malign Intervention
Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, target foe receives 20% less benefit from healing. If target foe dies while hexed with Malign Intervention, a level 1...14...17 masterless bone horror is summoned.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st and use the higher level wherever the spell's level appears in the stat block.

spell.name: Determined Shot
entries: Fire a shot, determined to hit, allowing you to immediately cast a spell if you miss.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d8} damage.
On a miss, you can immediately cast another spell without requiring an action.
Determined Shot
Bow Attack. If Determined Shot hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. If Determined Shot fails to hit, all of your attack skills are recharged.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Armor of Mist
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Encase yourself in a shielding armor of mist, improving your defense and agility.
For the duration, your speed is increased by 33%, and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Armor of Mist
Enchantment Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, you gain +10...34...40 armor and move 33% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Inspired Enchantment
entries: Remove a positive spell on a creature, gain initiative and replace this spell with the removed spell for the duration.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. The Target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed safe, the latest beneficial spell on the target ends. If a beneficial spell was ended this way, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d4} and replace this spell with the ended spell for the duration.
Inspired Enchantment
Spell. Removes an enchantment from target foe and gain 3...13...15 Energy. For 20 seconds, Inspired Enchantment is replaced with the enchantment removed from target foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Essence Bond
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Enchantment}
Create an essence bond between you and a creature, charging up your magical abilities every time the creature takes damage.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast a spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 21 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot. When the target takes damage from a non-friendly source, reduce the number you need to roll for the next roll by 2.
Essence Bond
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target ally takes physical or elemental damage, you gain 1 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Plague Sending
entries: {@bold Sacrifice:} 10%
Sacrifice some life essence to transfer a number of conditions from yourself to a group of creatures.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, each target gains a copy of the latest {@dice 1d4} of the following conditions on yourself: {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars},  {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Poisoned} or {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}. End all copied conditions on yourself.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Plague Sending
Spell. Transfer 1...3...3 negative condition[s] and [its/their] remaining duration[s] from yourself to target foe and all adjacent foes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, copy {@dice 1d4} additional condition for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Healing Spring
entries: Prepare a healing spring, which heals creatures which trigger it.

Conjure a 15-foot radius stationary {@condition invisible} trap at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. The next time a chosen creature enters the spell's area, the trap triggers, applying the following effects for 5 rounds:
Each chosen creature regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there.
Healing Spring
Trap. For 10 seconds, all adjacent allies are healed for 15...51...60 every 2 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.

components.m: a drop of spring water

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Grasping Earth
entries: {@bold Hex}
Make the earth around you cling to creatures, slowing them down.
Target each creature other than you within range. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target's speed is reduced by 50% for the duration.
Grasping Earth
Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, all nearby foes move 50% slower.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Mantra of Concentration
entries: {@bold Stance}
Start chanting a Mantra of {@status Concentration|XPHB}, improving your ability to maintain {@status concentration} on the next spell.

For the duration, the next time you cast a {@status concentration}, enchantment or hex spell, you cannot be interrupted while casting it, and you have a +5 bonus to Constitution saving throws made to hold {@status concentration} on that spell.
Mantra of Concentration
Stance. For 1...31...38 seconds, the next time you would be interrupted, you are not interrupted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 2 rounds for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Life Attunement
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Enchantment}
Attune a creature to life and healing, decreasing their attack damage, but increasing the healing they receive.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target regains hit points, they regain 25% more hit points but deal 25% less damage with weapon attacks.
Life Attunement
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally deals 30% less damage with attacks, but gains 14...43...50% more Health when healed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the % increases by 25% for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Rigor Mortis
entries: {@bold Hex}
Curse a creature with Rigor Mortis, stiffening their body, making them unable to benefit from any temporary AC bonuses.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The Target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the target cannot benefit from any temporary bonuses to AC.
Rigor Mortis
Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target foe cannot block.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Otyugh's Cry
entries: {@bold Unblockable}
Invoke the famous ogre beast master Otyugh to protect and enhance your animal companions.

Choose any number of friendly beasts, which obey your verbal commands, that can hear you within. When a target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, each targets gains the Unblockable property on their attacks.
Otyugh's Cry
Shout. For 10...22...25 seconds, your animal companion gains +24 armor and cannot be blocked.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Axe Twist

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 5
Twist your weapon into an existing wound, weakening your target.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and, if the target has a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars}, the target becomes {@condition weakness|GuildWars|weak} for the duration and takes an additional {@damage 2d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Axe Twist
Axe Attack. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a Deep Wound, you strike for 1...16...20 more damage and that foe suffers from Weakness for 20 seconds.

spell.name: Lightning Touch
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}
Conjure up lightning around your hands and release a shockwave of electricity upon touching a creature.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Target each creature other than you in a 5-foot-radius centered on the target. Make a melee spell attack against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 4d6} lightning damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition blinded} and has {@condition cracked armor|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Lightning Touch

Skill. Target touched foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 10...50...60 lightning damage, are Blinded for 1...3...4 second[s], and have Cracked Armor for 1...8...10 second[s]. This skill has 25% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Shame
entries: {@bold Hex}
Instill an intense sense of shame into a creature, stopping their next spell which targets an ally of theirs.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the next time the target casts a spell that targets an ally of theirs, the spell fails and has no effect, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 2d8} and your initiative gets increased by the initiative lost.
Shame
Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe casts a spell that targets an ally, the spell fails and you steal up to 5...12...14 Energy from that foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Life Bond
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Enchantment}
Create a link between you and another willing creature, taking half the damage the creature would have taken instead.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target has resistance to all damage. Also, each time the target takes damage, you lose health equal to the damage taken{@dice  - 2d4}.
Life Bond

Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target other ally takes damage from an attack, half the damage is redirected to you. The damage you receive this way is reduced by 3...25...30.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Taste of Death
entries: Suck out the life force of an undead minion you control to heal yourself.

Choose one friendly undead creature, which has been created by a spell or an ability, that you can see within range. The target loses health equal to {@dice 8d4} and you regain hit points equal to the amount of health lost.
This spell's health loss increases by {@dice 4d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 12d4}), 11th level ({@dice 16d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 20d4}).
Taste of Death
Spell. Steal up to 100...340...400 Health from target animated undead ally.

spell.name: Symbiosis
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Summon a nature spirit of the Symbiosis, improving health for every beneficial spell on a creature.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit, the creature's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for each beneficial spell on them.
Symbiosis

Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For each enchantment on a non-spirit creature within range, that creature has +27...125...150 maximum Health. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd or 3rd level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
Additionally, when you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, a creature's hit points increase by an additional 5 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Belly Smash
entries: Strike a {@condition prone} creature so hard that the blood spatter of the impact blinds adjacent creatures.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and, if the target is knocked {@condition prone}, target each creature other than you in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target is {@condition blinded} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Belly Smash
Hammer Attack. If this attack strikes a foe who is knocked down, the resulting dust cloud will blind adjacent foes for 3...6...7 seconds.

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Ward Against Melee
entries: Conjure a ward at your location, protecting your allies from melee attacks.

Conjure a 20-foot radius stationary ward at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. When a target is in the radius of the spell, a target has a +5 bonus to AC against melee weapon attacks.
Ward Against Melee
Ward Spell. You create a Ward Against Melee at your current location. For 5...17...20 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area have a 50% chance to block melee attacks.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the AC bonus increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Wastrel's Worry
entries: {@bold Hex}
Transform a creature's momentary indecision into a psychic shock.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. At the end of the creature's next turn, if it did not use any abilities or cast any spells successfully, target each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d4} psychic damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Wastrel's Worry
Hex Spell. After 3 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes take 20...84...100 damage. If that foe successfully uses a skill, Wastrel's Worry ends prematurely and does no damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Signet of Devotion
entries: {@bold Signet:} Short Rest
Activate your signet of devotion, healing a creature.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Signet of Devotion
Signet. Heal target ally for 14...83...100 Health.

spell.name: Touch of Agony
entries: {@bold Sacrifice:} 10%
Sacrifice your own blood to inflict untold agony on a creature.
Choose one creature within range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d12} necrotic damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 2d12} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 4d12}), 11th level ({@dice 6d12}), and 17th level ({@dice 8d12}).
Touch of Agony
Skill. Target touched foe takes 20...50...58 shadow damage.

spell.name: Throw Dirt
