entries: Throw dirt into a group of creatures, blinding them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Target each creature other than you in a 10-foot-radius centered on the target. Make a melee spell attack against each target. On a hit, a target is {@condition blinded} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Throw Dirt
Skill. Target touched foe and foes adjacent to your target become Blinded for 3...13...15 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Desperation Blow
entries: You attempt a desperate blow, uncertain of the outcome.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d12} damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, roll a {@dice d4}. Depending on the result, the target gains one of the following conditions for the duration: 1 - {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, 2 - {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}, 3 - {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars} ({@damage 2d4} damage), 4 - {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}.
You are knocked {@condition prone}, and cannot stand up this turn.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Desperation Blow

Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage, and your target suffers from one of the following conditions: Deep Wound (for 20 seconds), Weakness (for 20 seconds), Bleeding (for 25 seconds), or Crippled (for 15 seconds). After making a Desperation Blow, you are knocked down.

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Aegis
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Conjure up a protective aegis around all party members, increasing their AC.
Choose any number of friendly creatures within range. For the duration, a target has a +5 bonus to AC.
Aegis
Enchantment Spell. For 5...10...11 seconds, all party members within earshot have a 50% chance to block attacks.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Arcane Mimicry
entries: Weave your magic into an exact duplicate of an Elite spell of a friendly creature.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, replace this spell with the elite spell of the target.
Arcane Mimicry
Spell. For 20 seconds, Arcane Mimicry becomes the non-form elite skill from target other ally.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Contemplation of Purity
entries: Purge yourself of all impurities by stripping yourself of all your beneficial spells.
End all beneficial spells on yourself. For each beneficial spell ended this way, repeat all the following effects:
- You regain {@dice 1d4} hit points.
- The latest harmful spell on yourself ends.

- End the latest of the following conditions on yourself: {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars},  {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Poisoned} or {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}
You can end a maximum of 2 harmful spells and/or conditions this way.
Contemplation of Purity
Skill. Lose all enchantments. For each one lost, you gain 0...64...80 Health, lose one hex, and lose one condition (maximum 1...7...8 hexes and conditions).

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st and the maximum increases by 2 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Awaken the Blood
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Imbue your blood with necromantic energy, drawing out its true potential.

For the duration, when you cast a blood or curses themed spell of 1st level or higher, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting. Additionally, when you sacrifice health for a spell, you must sacrifice 50% more.
Awaken the Blood
Enchantment Spell. For 20...39...44 seconds, you gain +2 Blood Magic and +2 Curses, but whenever you sacrifice Health, you sacrifice 50% more than the normal amount.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Antidote Signet
entries: {@bold Signet:} Initiative
Activate your antidote signet, cleansing yourself of some conditions.

End {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition blinded|phb|Blindness} and the latest of the following conditions on yourself: {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars},  {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Poisoned} or {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}.
Antidote Signet
Signet. Cleanse yourself of Poison, Disease, and Blindness, and one additional condition.

spell.name: I Will Survive!
entries: Shout, “I Will Survive!”, granting yourself the strength you need to though out conditions affecting you.
For the duration, at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} per condition affecting you.
If you drop to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
"I Will Survive!"
Shout. You gain +3 Health regeneration for each condition you are suffering. This regeneration expires after 5...10...11 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Arcane Thievery
entries: Use your arcane skills to steal an enemies spell.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. The Target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed safe, one random spell the target has prepared cannot be used for the duration. Also replace this spell with the disabled spell for the duration.
Arcane Thievery
Spell. For 5...29...35 seconds, one random spell is disabled for target foe, and Arcane Thievery is replaced by that spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target makes its saving throw with disadvantage. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can choose which spell gets disabled.

spell.name: Healing Seed
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Plant a healing seed on a friendly creature, which bursts with healing energy every time the creature takes damage.

Choose one friendly creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. For the duration when the target takes damage from a non-friendly source, target each friendly creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Healing Seed
Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target other ally takes damage, that ally and all adjacent allies gain 3...25...30 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Barbed Signet
entries: {@bold Signet} Short Rest
Activate your barbed signet, making necrotic vines sprout in an area, lacerating creatures.
{@bold Sacrifice.} You lose health equal to 8% of your maximum hit points.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 4d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Barbed Signet
Signet. You inflict Bleeding for 3...13...15 seconds on target foe and all adjacent foes.

spell.name: Barbed Trap
entries: Prepare a barbed trap, which damages, cripples and bleeds creatures which trigger it.

Conjure a 15-foot radius stationary {@condition invisible} trap at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. The next time a non-chosen creature enters the spell's area, the trap triggers, applying the following effect for 1 round:

Each non-chosen creature must make a Dexterity saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d8} piercing damage, starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for one minute, taking {@damage 4d4} damage and becomes {@condition crippled|GuildWars} for one minute. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Barbed Trap

Trap. When Barbed Trap is triggered, all nearby foes are struck for 7...20...23 piercing damage, become Crippled, and begin Bleeding for 3...21...25 seconds. Barbed Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.

components.m: thorned vines

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd and the damage of the {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} condition increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Axe Rake

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 5
Go for the legs of a creature with a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars}, dealing increased damage and crippling them.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and, if the target has a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars}, the target becomes {@condition crippled|GuildWars} for the duration and takes an additional {@damage 2d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Axe Rake
Axe Attack. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a Deep Wound, you strike for +1...8...10 damage, and that foe becomes Crippled for 15 seconds.

spell.name: Chain Lightning (Guild Wars)
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}, {@bold Overcast:} 2
Conjure a bolt of lightning which bounces between enemies.
Choose one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 8d6} lightning damage.

If you hit the target, the attack leaps from the target to a different creature of your choice within 15-feet of the target. Make a new attack roll with disadvantage against the new target, and make a new damage roll, which could cause the attack to leap again.
A creature can be targeted only once by each casting of this spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 4th.
Chain Lightning
Spell. Target foe and up to two other foes near your target are struck for 10...70...85 lightning damage. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

spell.name: Ethereal Burden
entries: {@bold Hex:} You cannot choose to end {@status concentration} on this spell.
Put ethereal shackles on a creature.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The Target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the target's speed is halved.
When this spell ends, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 4d4}.
Ethereal Burden
Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower. When Ethereal Burden ends, you gain 10...16...18 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Protective Bond
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Enchantment}
Form a protective bond between yourself and the target, limiting the damage they can take in one hit, by expending spell slots.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target would take damage, if that damage would be more than 5% of the target's maximum hit points, reduce the damage to 5% of the target's maximum hit points by expending one of your spell slots of your choice. If you cannot expend a spell slot, this spell ends.
Protective Bond

Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally cannot lose more than 5% max Health due to damage from a single attack or spell. When Protective Bond prevents damage, you lose 6...4...3 Energy or the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Dark Bond
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Form a dark bond between yourself and your undead minions, diverting damage from yourself to them.

For the duration, when you would take damage, the closest friendly undead creature, which has been created by a spell or an ability, within 30-feet of you, takes 75% of the damage you would have taken.
Dark Bond
Enchantment Spell. For the next 30...54...60 seconds, whenever you receive damage, your closest minion suffers 75% of that damage for you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the range of the spell increases by 15-feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Brutal Strike
entries: Command your pet to attempt a Brutal Strike.

Choose one beast, which obeys your verbal commands, that can hear you within range. The beast uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the beast can see within the beast's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 4d6} damage, if the target was below 50% of their maximum hit points, the target takes an additional {@damage 4d6} damage.
Brutal Strike
Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Brutal Strike that deals +5...29...35 damage. If that attack strikes a foe whose Health is below 50%, that foe takes an additional +5...29...35 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Crushing Blow
entries: Strike a creature while they are {@condition prone} to crush an appendage, inflicting a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars}.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d8} damage and, if the target is knocked {@condition prone}, suffers from a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Crushing Blow
Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +1...16...20 damage. If you hit a knocked-down foe you inflict a Deep Wound, lowering your target's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Crystal Wave
entries: Release a wave of crystal energy, which purifies any negative conditions affecting a creature, dealing more damage for each removed.

Target each creature other than you within range. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 8d6} force damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

Also end all of the following conditions on a target: {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars},  {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Poisoned} and {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}. A target takes {@damage 2d4} force damage for each condition ended.
Crystal Wave
Spell. Foes adjacent to you are struck for 10...58...70 damage but are cured of any negative conditions. Each condition removed deals 5...13...15 damage.

components.m: a crystal shard

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 4th and the damage per condition ended increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Hex Breaker
entries: {@bold Stance}
Assume the stance of the hex breaker, preventing the next hex on yourself and retaliating against the caster.

For the duration, the next time you are the target of a harmful spell which requires {@status concentration} or is a Hex, you are immune to the spell's effects and the caster takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage.
Hex Breaker
Stance. For 5...65...80 seconds, the next time you are the target of a hex, that hex fails and the caster takes 10...39...46 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 2 rounds for each slot level above 1st and the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Protective Spirit
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Summon a protective spirit around a creature, reducing the next big hit they take.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the next time the target would take damage, if that damage would be more than 10% of the target's maximum hit points, reduce the damage to 10% of the target's maximum hit points, then this spell ends.
Protective Spirit
Enchantment Spell. For 5...19...23 seconds, target ally cannot lose more than 10% max Health due to damage from a single attack or spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Deathly Chill
entries: Put the chill of death into a creature, dealing increased damage to high health creatures.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d6} cold damage and if the target was above 50% of their maximum hit points they take an additional {@damage 3d6} cold damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
Deathly Chill
Spell. Target foe is struck for 5...41...50 cold damage. If that foe's Health is above 50%, you deal an additional 5...41...50 shadow damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the initial damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Maiming Strike
entries: Command your pet to maim a creature.

Choose one beast, which obeys your verbal commands, that can hear you within range. The beast uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the beast can see within the beast's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 4d6} damage and, if the target willingly moved on its last turn, the target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition crippled|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Maiming Strike
Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Maiming Strike that deals +5...17...20 damage. If that attack hits a moving foe that foe becomes Crippled for 3...13...15 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Deadly Riposte

time.condition: which you take when you are hit by a melee attack

entries: Counter an opponent's attack with a deadly riposte.

If you are wielding a one-handed melee weapon with the light and/or finesse properties, choose one attacking creature that you can see within range. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d8} damage, starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d4} damage and the attack roll misses.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Deadly Riposte
Skill. For 8 seconds, while you have a sword equipped, you block the next melee attack against you, and your attacker is struck for 15...75...90 damage and begins Bleeding for 3...21...25 seconds.

components.m: a one-handed melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the light and/or finesse properties

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Iron Mist
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Ionize some iron dust, making it form a mist around you, protecting you and empowering your air magic.

For the duration, when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Also, you can cast air, lightning, or thunder themed spells as an action, even if you already cast a spell as a bonus action on your turn, and you can cast air, lightning or thunder themed spells which take an action to cast as a bonus action, but any air, lightning or thunder themed spell you cast causes you to gain 2 rounds of {@condition overcast|GuildWars}.
Iron Mist
Enchantment Spell. For 8...14...15 seconds, you have +15 armor. Your Air Magic spells that target a foe activate and recharge 25% faster, but you are Overcast by 3 points.

components.m: a handful of iron powder

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th or 7th level, the duration increases to 1 hour. When you use a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the duration increases to 8 hours.

spell.name: Power Drain

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell

entries: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell, and drain their energy on successfully interrupting a spell.
Choose one creature, which is casting a spell, that you can see within range. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell fails and has no effect.
If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d4}.
Power Drain
Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and you gain 1...25...31 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the interrupted spell has no effect if its level is less than or equal to the level of the spell slot you used.

spell.name: Purge Signet
entries: {@bold Signet:} Short Rest
Activate your Purge Signet, removing all negative effects from a creature at the cost of your initiative.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. End {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars},  {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Poisoned} and {@condition Weakness|GuildWars} on the target. Also, all harmful spells on the target end.
Your initiative roll gets reduced by Nd6, where N is the number of conditions and harmful spells ended this way.
Purge Signet
Signet. Remove all hexes and conditions from target ally. You lose 10 Energy for each hex and each condition removed.

spell.name: Rend Enchantments
entries: Forcefully rend beneficial spell from a creature, taking damage for each holy themed spell.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the latest {@dice 1d4+1} beneficial spells on the target end. On a successful save, half as many spells are ended.
If a holy themed beneficial spell was ended this way, you lose health equal {@dice 1d6} per holy themed spell ended this way.
Rend Enchantments
Spell. Remove 5...8...9 enchantments from target foe. For each Monk enchantment removed, you lose 55...31...25 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, {@dice 1d4} additional spells are ended for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Predatory Season
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Summon a nature spirit of the Predatory Season, reducing healing and making creatures gain health every time they hit with a weapon attack.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit, when the creature regains hit points, they regain 20% less hit points and when the creature hits with a weapon attack, they regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4}, which is not reduced by this spell.
Predatory Season

Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all healing is reduced by 20%. If any of your attacks hit, you gain 5 Health. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

components.m: fresh blood

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Bonetti's Defense
entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 8, {@bold Stance}
Magically invoke the stance of the famous fencer Bonetti, and increase your AC against weapon attacks until you use a spell.
For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC against weapon attacks and if an attack misses you because of this bonus, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d8}.
When you cast a spell, this spell ends.
Bonetti's Defense
Stance. For 5...10...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks. You gain 5 Energy for each successful melee attack blocked. Bonetti's Defense ends if you use a skill.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Disciplined Stance
entries: {@bold Stance}
Refuse to give into the adrenaline of battle, and focus on your training, improving AC and reducing damage, as long as you do not expend adrenaline.
For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC against weapon attacks and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
When you cast a spell which requires adrenaline, this spell ends.
Disciplined Stance
Stance. For 1...3...4 second[s], you gain +10 armor and have a 75% chance to block attacks. Disciplined Stance ends if you use an adrenal skill.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Kinetic Armor
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Conjure an armor around you, which renews itself by siphoning off a small amount of spell energy.

For the duration, when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, when you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, the duration of this spell resets.
Kinetic Armor
Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, you gain +20...68...80 armor. Whenever you cast a spell, Kinetic Armor is renewed for 8 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Signet of Humility
entries: {@bold Signet:} Short Rest
Activate your Signet of Humility, humbling your target into not using their Elite skill.
Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. The Target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed safe, the target cannot use Elite spells for the duration.
Signet of Humility
Signet. Target foe's elite skill is disabled for 1...13...16 second[s]. Your non-Mesmer skills are disabled for 10 seconds.

spell.name: Rebirth
entries: Resurrect and teleport a creature from a large range, with a large magical backlash.

Choose one friendly creature, which has not been dead for more than 1 minute, that you can see within range. The target returns to life with 25% of their maximum hit points and gets teleported within 5 feet of you. On the target's next turn, the target can use either an action or a bonus action, not both. Your initiative gets reduced by 30.
This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
Rebirth

Spell. Resurrect target party member. Target party member is returned to life with 25% Health and zero Energy, and is teleported to your current location. All of target's skills are disabled for 10...4...3 seconds. This spell consumes all of your remaining Energy.

m.text: gems worth 300 gp, which the spell consumes

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the range of the spell increases by 30 feet for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Spinal Shivers
entries: Make a creature extremely sensitive to the cold, interrupting them every time they take cold damage.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes cold damage, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target can't cast spells or use abilities until the end of their next turn.
Spinal Shivers
Hex Spell. For 10...34...40 seconds, whenever target foe is struck for cold damage while using a skill, that foe is interrupted, and you lose 10...6...5 Energy or Spinal Shivers ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Savage Shot

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of using an ability or casting a spell, if you interrupt a spell this way, the target takes additional damage.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ability/spell fails and has no effect.
If a spell failed this way, the target takes an additional {@damage 3d8} damage.
Savage Shot
Bow Attack. If Savage Shot hits, your target's action is interrupted. If that action was a spell, you strike for +13...25...28 damage.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 3rd.

spell.name: Heavy Blow

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 5
Put all your adrenaline into a powerful blow, which knocks down weakened foes.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and, if the target is weakened, the target is knocked {@condition prone} and takes an additional {@damage 4d6} damage.
You lose all adrenaline.
Heavy Blow
Hammer Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If this attack hits a foe suffering from Weakness, that foe is knocked down and you strike for +1...24...30 damage.

spell.name: Shock
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}, {@bold Overcast:} 5
Infuse your hands with lightning energy and punch a creature, knocking them {@condition prone} on a hit.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d6} lightning damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Shock
Skill. Target touched foe is knocked down and struck for 10...50...60 lightning damage. This skill has 25% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Spirit Shackles
entries: {@bold Hex}
Throw a spectral pair of shackles around a creature's hand, reducing their initiative every time they attack.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit for the duration, when the target makes a weapon attack, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d6}.
Spirit Shackles
Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, target foe loses 5 Energy whenever that foe attacks.

components.m: a pair of shackles

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st, and you can target one additional creature for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Smite Hex
entries: Smite a harmful spell on a friendly creature to deal damage to everyone around it.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. The latest harmful spell on the target ends. If a harmful spell was ended this way, target each creature other than the target in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. A target takes {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.
Smite Hex
Spell. Remove a hex from target ally. If a hex is removed, foes in the area suffer 10...70...85 holy damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Unholy Feast
entries: Suck out the life force from creatures around you, feasting on their energy.

Target each creature other than you within range. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Unholy Feast
Spell. Steal up to 10...54...65 Health from up to 1...3...4 foes [sic] in the area.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Scavenger Strike
entries: Command your pet to attempt a Scavenger Strike.

Choose one beast, which obeys your verbal commands, that can hear you within range. The beast uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the beast can see within the beast's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d6} damage, and if the target is suffering from a condition, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d4}.
Scavenger Strike
Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Scavenger Strike that deals +10...22...25 damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is suffering a condition, you gain 3...13...15 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Pure Strike
entries: {@bold Unblockable}
Perform a pure strike, untainted by any stances.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d8} damage.
If you are not in a stance, this attack gains the Unblockable property.
Pure Strike
Sword Attack. If Pure Strike hits, you strike for +1...24...30 damage. If you are not using a stance, Pure Strike cannot be blocked.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

spell.name: Stone Daggers
entries: Conjure two stone daggers and hurl them at a creature, inflicting {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} if you are {@condition overcast|GuildWars}.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make two ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d12} piercing damage.
{@bold Overcast:}. Additionally, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for 1 round, taking {@damage 1d4} damage.
Stone Daggers
Spell. Send out two Stone Daggers. Each Stone Dagger strikes target foe for 8...28...33 earth damage if it hits. If you are Overcast, each projectile inflicts Bleeding for 1...4...5 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Sympathetic Visage
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Create a visage for a friendly creature, which punishes all those who attack them.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target gets hit by a melee weapon attack, target each hostile creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each target loses all adrenaline and their initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d4}.
Sympathetic Visage
Enchantment Spell. For 4...9...10 seconds, whenever target ally is hit by a melee attack, all adjacent foes lose all adrenaline and 3 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Watchful Spirit
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Enchantment}
Use some of your divine energy to place a watchful spirit over a creature, healing them every turn and for a larger amount when the spell ends.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.
When this spell ends, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 8d4} + your spellcasting ability.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends without healing the target.
Watchful Spirit
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally gains +2 Health regeneration. That ally is healed for 30...150...180 Health when Watchful Spirit ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the healing on spell end increases each by {@dice 4d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Well of Suffering
entries: Utter a foul curse, exploding a corpse into a well of suffering, damaging foes in its area every turn.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, for the duration, each hostile creature in a 20-foot-radius centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d8} necrotic damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Well of Suffering
Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Suffering at its location. For 10...26...30 seconds, foes in that area suffer -1...5...6 Health degeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Storm Chaser
entries: {@bold Stance}
Channel elemental energy throughout your body, imbuing it with unnatural speed.
For the duration, your speed is increased by 25% and when you take acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d4}.
Storm Chaser
Stance. For 8...18...20 seconds, you move 25% faster, and you gain 1...4...5 Energy whenever you take elemental damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Thrill of Victory
entries: You gloat over a creature, gaining adrenaline if you have more health than them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d8} damage and if you have more hit points than the target, you gain {@dice 1d4} strikes of adrenaline.
Thrill of Victory
Melee Attack. If this blow hits, you deal +20...36...40 damage. If you have more Health than target foe, you gain 1...2...2 strike[s] of adrenaline.

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Balthazar's Aura
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Sheath an ally in a radiant aura of Balthazar, which burns all those close to them every turn.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, target each creature other than the target in a 10-foot-radius centered on the target. Each new target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d8} radiant damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Balthazar's Aura
Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, foes adjacent to target ally take 10...22...25 holy damage each second.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Animate Bone Minions
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Exploit a nearby corpse to create a two low-level Bone Horrors.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, the target becomes two {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars|Bone Horrors}. When using the level which appears in the stat block, subtract 2.
The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars|Bone Horrors} remain for the duration or until they reach zero hit points, at which point they will disintegrate into ash.

{@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars|Bone Horrors} are friendly to you and your allies for the duration. If you fall {@condition unconscious}, the {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars|Bone Horrors} becomes hostile towards everything, instead of disintegrating into ash. The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars|Bone Horrors} act on your initiative, but take their turn directly after yours. The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars|Bone Horrors} are in the DMs control.
On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to animate another two {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars|Bone Horrors} this way.

components.m: pages of an old pamphlet

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell's level appears in the stat block. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
Animate Bone Minions
Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate two level 0...10...12 bone minions.

spell.name: Choking Gas
entries: {@bold Preparation}
Attach some concentrated corpse flower essence to your arrows, disrupting all spellcasting around the impact area.

For the duration, your ranged weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d4} poison damage and when you hit a target with a ranged weapon attack, target each creature in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target can't cast spells until the end of their next turn.
Choking Gas
Preparation. For 1...10...12 seconds, your arrows deal 1...7...8 more damage and spread Choking Gas to all adjacent foes on impact. Choking Gas interrupts foes attempting to cast spells.

components.m: a petal of a corpse flower

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Deep Freeze
entries: {@bold Hex}
Rapidly freeze an area, slowing down all creatures inside it.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 8d6} cold damage, and for the duration the target's speed is reduced by 66%. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
Deep Freeze
Hex Spell. You cause a Deep Freeze at target foe's location. All foes in this area are struck for 10...70...85 cold damage, and for 10 seconds, they move 66% slower.

components.m: a bunch of ice cubes and a metal box

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Blackout
entries: {@bold Hex}
Completely blackout yourself and a creature you touch, preventing you both from using spells or abilities.
You touch a creature. The target and you cannot cast spells or use abilities for the duration.
Blackout
Skill. For 2...5...6 seconds, all of touched target foe's skills are disabled, and all of your skills are disabled for 5 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Blessed Signet
entries: {@bold Signet:} Long Rest
Activate your blessed signet, drawing divine power, refueling spell slots expended in the casting of bonds.
If you are maintaining one or more bonds, regain spell slots expended in the casting of those bonds.
Blessed Signet
Signet. For each enchantment you are maintaining, you gain 3 Energy. You cannot gain more than 3...20...24 Energy in this way.

spell.name: Demonic Flesh
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Turn your own flesh demonic, letting it lash out creatures around you when you cast a spell.

When you cast a spell of 1st level or higher that targets a hostile creature, target each creature other than you, that you can see within range. Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw.  On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d6} necrotic damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Demonic Flesh
Enchantment Spell. For 30...54...60 seconds, whenever you use a skill that targets a foe, you deal 5...17...20 shadow damage to all other foes adjacent to you.

components.m: a piece of rotted flesh

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Concussion Shot

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell

entries: You quickly fire an arrow in response to a creature casting a spell, interrupting the spell on a hit and {@condition dazed|GuildWars|dazing} it.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} damage, the spell fails and has no effect and the target is {@condition dazed|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Concussion Shot
Bow Attack. If Concussion Shot hits while target foe is casting a spell, the spell is interrupted and your target is Dazed for 5...17...20 seconds. This attack deals only 1...13...16 damage.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 4th.

spell.name: To the Limit!
entries: Push yourself to your limit, overcoming your fatigue.
You gain {@dice 1d4} strikes of adrenaline for each hostile creature within range.
For the duration, your hit point maximum and current hit points increase by {@dice 2d10}.
"To the Limit!"
Shout. For each foe within earshot (maximum 1...5...6), you gain one strike of adrenaline. For 10...18...20 seconds, your maximum Health is increased by 10...50...60.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, your hit points increase by an additional {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Earthquake (Guild Wars)
entries: {@bold Overcast:} 5
Cause a massive earthquake in a small area, knocking down creatures and damaging them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 10d6} force damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
Earthquake
Spell. You invoke an Earthquake at target foe's location. All foes near this location are knocked down and are struck for 26...85...100 earth damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Mind Wrack
entries: {@bold Hex}
Fray a creatures' mind, sending psychic shockwaves through them every time you target them with one of your other spells.

Choose one creature that you can see within range with an initiative higher than 0. The Target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, if the target is the target of a Mesmer themed spell, which does not require {@status concentration} or is not an Enchantment/Hex, the target initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d4}. If this spell reduces the target's initiative, the target takes 2 psychic damage per initiative lost.
If the target's initiative is ever 0 or lower, this spell ends, and the target takes {@damage 4d6} psychic damage.
Mind Wrack

Hex Spell. For 5...33...40 seconds, whenever this foe is the target of any of your non-hex Mesmer skills, that foe loses 1 Energy and takes 5...21...25 damage per point of Energy lost. If the target foe's Energy drops to 0, Mind Wrack ends and that foe takes 15...83...100 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage for each initiative lost increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st and the damage when the spell ends increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Scourge Healing
entries: {@bold Hex}
Draw on your divine power to punish all those who heal a creature.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, when the target regains hit points, target the healer. The new target takes {@damage 2d10} radiant damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.
Scourge Healing
Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, every time target foe is healed, the healer takes 15...67...80 holy damage.

spell.name: Price of Failure
entries: {@bold Hex}
Curse a creature to be more inaccurate and punish them for missing with their attacks.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when the target makes an attack roll with a weapon, they must roll a {@dice d20}. On a 5 or lower, the attack misses. Additionally, if the target misses with a weapon attack, they take {@damage 2d6} necrotic damage.
Price of Failure
Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe has a 25% chance to miss with attacks and takes 1...37...46 damage whenever that foe fails to hit in combat.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Edge of Extinction
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Summon a nature spirit of Extinction, damaging all creatures of the same type when one of them dies.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit, and they drop to 0 hit points, all creatures of the same creature type take {@damage 3d6} force damage, if they are also within 120 feet of the nature spirit.
Edge of Extinction

Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. If a non-spirit creature within range dies, Edge of Extinction deals 14...43...50 damage to all creatures of the same type that are below 90% Health and within range of the spirit. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 4th.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Savage Slash

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of using an ability or casting a spell.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ability/spell fails and has no effect.
If a spell failed this way, the target takes an additional {@damage 4d6} damage.
Savage Slash
Sword Attack. If this attack hits, it interrupts target foe's action. If that action was a spell, you deal 1...32...40 extra damage.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 3rd.

spell.name: Flame Burst
entries: A burst of flames shoots out from you, searing all creatures near you.

Target each creature other than you within range. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d6} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Flame Burst
Spell. All nearby foes are struck for 15...99...120 fire damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blessed Aura
entries: {@bold Bond}, {@bold Enchantment}
Surround yourself with a shimmering blessed aura, extending the duration of your spells.
For the duration, when you cast a Cleric, Druid or Paladin spell, with a timed duration, extend that duration by 25%.
Blessed Aura
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, Monk enchantments you cast last 10...30...35% longer.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the % increases by 25% for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Animate Bone Fiend
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Exploit a nearby corpse to create a Bone Fiend.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, the target becomes a {@creature Bone Fiend|GuildWars}.
The {@creature Bone Fiend|GuildWars} remains for the duration or until it reaches zero hit points, at which point it will disintegrate into ash.

The {@creature Bone Fiend|GuildWars} is friendly to you and your allies for the duration. If you fall {@condition unconscious}, the {@creature Bone Fiend|GuildWars} becomes hostile towards everything, instead of disintegrating into ash. The {@creature Bone Fiend|GuildWars} acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. The {@creature Bone Fiend|GuildWars} is in the DMs control.
On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to animate another Bone Fiend this way.

components.m: the tail bone of a devourer

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell's level appears in the stat block. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
Animate Bone Fiend
Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 1...14...17 bone fiend. Bone fiends can attack at range.

spell.name: Incendiary Bonds
entries: {@bold Hex}, {@bold Overcast:} 2
Tether yourself to a creature, charging up a flame expulsion, damaging and {@condition burning|GuildWars} all creatures around the target after a short delay.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. When this spell ends because its duration ran out, or the target drops to 0 hit points, target each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d6} fire damage and starts {@condition burning|GuildWars} for 1 round, taking {@damage 2d6} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
Incendiary Bonds
Hex Spell. After 3 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes are struck for 20...68...80 fire damage and are set on fire for 1...3...3 second[s]. Activates early if target foe dies.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: I Will Avenge You!
entries: Shout “I Will Avenge You!” regaining health every turn and increasing your attack speed.
For the duration, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn and at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} hit points.
The duration increases by 1 round for each {@condition unconscious} or dead ally within range.
"I Will Avenge You!"
Shout. For each dead ally, you gain 10 seconds of +3...6...7 Health regeneration and your attack speed increases by 25%.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Charm Animal
entries: Channel your magic into tracking down and charming a wild animal.

As part of the casting of this spell, you can spend {@dice 1d4} hours magically searching for an appropriate beast to charm. If you do so, roll on the {@table Charm Animal Beast List - 1st Level|GuildWars} table by making either a Wisdom (Animal Handling), a Wisdom (Survival) or an Intelligence (Nature) check to determine which beast will appear (your DM might decide to replace animals from the list).

When you find an appropriate beast to charm, either by searching for it or having already encountered one (in which case it needs to be challenge rating 1 or lower), you can attempt to charm it by touching it.

When you successfully touch it, it must make Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition charmed} by you until next dawn, at which point you can expend a spell slot of equal or higher level than the one used in the casting of this spell to maintain the {@condition charmed} condition on the beast. To do this, you must have the Charm Animal spell prepared, or any other spell which says that it can be used instead.

The {@condition charmed} creature is friendly to you and your companions. While the creature is {@condition charmed}, you have a telepathic link with it as long as the two of you are on the same plane of existence. You can use this telepathic link to issue commands to the creature while you are conscious (no action required), which it does its best to obey. You can specify a simple and general course of action, such as “Attack that creature,” “Run over there,” or “Fetch that object.” If the creature completes the order and doesn't receive further direction from you, it defends and preserves itself to the best of its ability.
After charming an animal with this spell, you cannot cast this spell again until {@dice 2d6} days have passed.

components.m: a morsel of food

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration to find an appropriate animal increases by 1 hour, the table changes to the one appropriate to the spell level and the maximum challenge rating for beasts not found via a table increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.
Other tables:
- {@table Charm Animal Beast List - 2nd Level|GuildWars}
- {@table Charm Animal Beast List - 3rd Level|GuildWars}
- {@table Charm Animal Beast List - 4th Level|GuildWars}
- {@table Charm Animal Beast List - 5th Level|GuildWars}
- {@table Charm Animal Beast List - 6th Level|GuildWars}
- {@table Charm Animal Beast List - 7th Level|GuildWars}
- {@table Charm Animal Beast List - 8th Level|GuildWars}
- {@table Charm Animal Beast List - 9th Level|GuildWars}
Charm Animal
Skill. Charm target animal. Once charmed, your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped. You cannot charm an animal that is more than 4 levels above you.

spell.name: Arcane Conundrum
entries: {@bold Hex}
Befuddle a group of creatures with an arcane conundrum, increasing the casting time of their spells.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, a target can't cast spells as reactions, must cast spells which take a bonus action as an action, and any other spell takes twice as long to cast.
When this spell ends on a target, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d4}.
Arcane Conundrum
Hex Spell. For 5...13...15 seconds, spells cast by target foe and all adjacent foes take twice as long to cast. When this hex ends, you gain 1...6...7 energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Healing Touch
entries: You magically imbue a creature with vitality by touching them.
You touch a creature. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d8} + twice your spellcasting ability modifier.
Healing Touch
Spell. Heal target touched ally for 16...51...60 Health. Health gain from Divine Favor is doubled for this spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by your spellcasting ability modifier for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Chilblains
entries: Corrupt your blood to curse an area to wither away their enchantments.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d8} necrotic damage and the latest beneficial spell on a target ends. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
You are  {@condition Corruption|GuildWars|corrupted} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d4} damage}.
At the end of each of your turns, you can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Chilblains
Spell. You become Poisoned for 10 seconds. Foes in the area of your target are struck for 10...37...44 cold damage and lose 1...2...2 enchantment[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd and one additional spell ends for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Obsidian Flame
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}, {@bold Overcast:} 2
Sear an enemy with a magical obsidian flame.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 4d4} force damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
Obsidian Flame
Spell. Deal 22...94...112 damage to target foe. This spell ignores armor.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Mend Condition
entries: Purge one condition on a creature and heal them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. End the latest of the following conditions on the target: {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition blinded|phb|Blindness}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars}, {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, or {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}. Then the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} if a condition was removed.
Mend Condition

Spell. Remove one condition (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, or Deep Wound) from target other ally. If a condition is removed, that ally is healed for 5...57...70 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Dust Trap
entries: Prepare a dust trap, which damages and blinds creatures which trigger it.

Conjure a 15-foot radius stationary {@condition invisible} trap at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. The next time a non-chosen creature enters the spell's area, the trap triggers, applying the following effect for 5 rounds:

Each non-chosen creature must make a Constitution saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 1d8} bludgeoning damage and becomes {@condition blinded} for one minute. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Dust Trap

Trap. When Dust Trap is triggered, every second (for 5 seconds total), all nearby foes are Blinded for 3...7...8 seconds and take 10...22...25 damage. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted. Dust Trap ends after 90 seconds.

components.m: a handful of fine sand

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Shields Up!
entries: Warn your allies of incoming ranged attacks, increasing their defense against them.

Choose any number of creatures that can hear you within range. For the duration, whenever a target takes damage from a ranged weapon attack, you can roll {@dice 2d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
"Shields Up!"
Shout. For 5...10...11 seconds, you and all party members within earshot gain +60 armor against incoming projectile attacks.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ether Lord
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Sheath yourself in woven ether, donning the robes of an ether lord, elevating your spellcasting to new heights, at a cost.
You lose all 1st level, and lower, spell slots.
For the duration, 1st level and lower spells do not require spell slots.
Ether Lord
Hex Spell. You lose all Energy. For 5...9...10 seconds, target foe suffers -1...3...3 Energy degeneration, and you experience +1...3...3 Energy regeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the level of the spells and spell slots each increases by 1 for every two slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Malaise
entries: {@bold Hex}
Afflict yourself with a malaise and spread it to an enemy, corrupting their spellcasting.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of your turns, you take {@damage 1d4} necrotic damage. Additionally, for the duration, when the target expends a spell slot to cast a spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 10 or lower, the spell expends an additional spell slot. If an additional spell slot is expended this way, this spell ends and the target takes {@damage 1d10} necrotic damage.
Malaise

Hex Spell. For 5...29...35 seconds, target foe suffers -1 Energy degeneration and you suffer -1 Health degeneration. If target foe's Energy reaches 0, that foe takes 5...41...50 damage and Malaise ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Swirling Aura
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Envelop yourself in a watery aura, regaining health every turn and increasing your defense against projectiles.
For the duration, at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d6}. Additionally, for the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC against ranged weapon attacks.
{@bold Overcast:} Choose any number of friendly creatures that you can see within 150-feet. A target also gains the effect of this spell.
Swirling Aura

Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, you are enchanted with Swirling Aura and have 1...5...6 Health regeneration and a 50% chance to block projectiles. If you are Overcast when you cast this spell, all party members in earshot are also enchanted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Guilt
entries: {@bold Hex}
Worm yourself into the consciousness of a creature by inducing an intense feeling of guilt.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the next time the target casts a spell that targets an enemy of theirs, the spell fails and has no effect, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 4d8}, and your initiative gets increased by the initiative lost.
Guilt
Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe casts a spell that targets a foe, the spell fails and you steal up to 5...12...14 Energy from that foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Vengeance
entries: {@bold Enchantment:} You cannot choose to end {@status concentration} on this spell.
Bring back a dead creature for a short duration to enact vengeance.

Choose one friendly creature, which has not been dead for more than 1 minute, that you can see within range. The target returns to life with 100% of their maximum hit points. For the duration, the target deals an additional 25% damage.
When this spell ends, any target returned to life by this spell dies.
This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
Vengeance

Enchantment Spell. Bring target dead party member back to life at full Health and full Energy. For 30 seconds, that party member deals 25% more damage. When this enchantment ends, target party member dies. Deaths while under the effects of this enchantment do not incur a death penalty.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 5th.

m.text: gems worth 150 gp for each target, which the spell consumes

spell.name: Signet of Agony
entries: {@bold Sacrifice:} 10%, {@bold Signet:} Short Rest
Feed your signet of agony with your blood, to release a devastating blast of necromantic energy around you.
For the duration, you start {@condition bleeding|GuildWars}, taking {@damage 1d4} damage.

Target each creature other than you within range. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d8} necrotic damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
At the end of each of your turns, you can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Signet of Agony
Signet. You suffer from Bleeding for 25 seconds. All nearby foes take 10...58...70 damage.

spell.name: Flame Trap
entries: Prepare a flame trap, which damages and burns creatures which trigger it.

Conjure a 15-foot radius stationary {@condition invisible} trap at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. The next time a non-chosen creature enters the spell's area, the trap triggers, applying the following effect for 3 rounds:

Each non-chosen creature must make a Dexterity saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d4} fire damage and starts {@condition burning} for one minute, taking {@damage 1d4} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Flame Trap

Trap. When Flame Trap is triggered, every second (for 3 seconds total), all nearby foes are struck for 5...17...20 fire damage and set on fire for 1...3...3 second[s]. Flame Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.

components.m: pitch

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Defensive Stance
entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 5, {@bold Stance}
Assume a defensive stance, gaining adrenaline at the end of it for each melee weapon attack spell you have prepared.
For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC against weapon attacks.
When this spell ends, you gain one strike of adrenalin for each melee weapon attack spell you have prepared (maximum 2).
Defensive Stance

Stance. For 1...4...5 second[s], you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks. When Defensive Stance ends, you gain one strike of adrenaline for each melee attack skill you have (maximum 0...3...4).

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st and the maximum increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Windborne Speed
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Imbue a creature with the speed of the wind.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target's speed is increased by 33%.
Windborne Speed
Enchantment Spell. For 5...11...13 seconds, target ally moves 33% faster.

components.m: a quill
