entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Mantra of Persistence
entries: {@bold Stance}
Start repeating a mantra pf persistence, extending the duration of your illusion themed spells.
For the duration, when you cast an illusion themed spell, which targets an enemy, with a timed duration, extend that duration by 25%.
Mantra of Persistence
Stance. For 5...21...25 seconds, any Illusion Magic hex you cast lasts 10...34...40% longer.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the % increases by 25% for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Zealot's Fire
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Wreath allies your target with your spells in the Zealot's Flame, {@condition burning|GuildWars} everything around them.

For the duration, when you cast a spell that targets an ally, target each creature other than the target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes  {@damage 2d6} fire damage.
Zealot's Fire
Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, whenever you use a skill that targets an ally, all foes adjacent to that target are struck for 5...29...35 fire damage and you lose 1 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Well of The Profane
entries: Turn a corpse into a profane well, stripping all enemies of beneficial spells, and preventing new ones from being applied.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, for the duration, each hostile creature in a 20-foot-radius centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, all beneficial spells on a target end, and the target cannot be the target of or benefit from beneficial spells.
Well of the Profane

Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of the Profane at its location. For 8...18...20 seconds, foes in that area are stripped of all enchantments and cannot be the target of further enchantments. (50% failure chance with Death Magic 4 or less.)

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Winnowing
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Call forth a spirit of winnowing, which increases all physical damage.
Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit and takes bludgeoning, piercing or slashing damage, they take an additional {@damage 1d4} damage.
Winnowing
Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within range take 4 additional damage whenever they take physical damage. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
Additionally, when you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Shield Bash

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range make a weapon attack roll which is part of a spell

entries: Block an incoming attack spell with your shield.

The triggering attack misses you, and if it was a melee weapon attack, the attacker must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the attacker is knocked {@condition prone}, and the spell can't be used again for 3 rounds.
Shield Bash

Skill. For 5...10...11 seconds, while wielding a shield, the next attack skill used against you is blocked. If it was a melee skill, your attacker is knocked down and that skill is disabled for an additional 15 seconds.

components.m: a shield worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Clumsiness
entries: {@bold Hex}
Induce a momentary clumsiness in a group of creatures, causing their next attack to miss and inflict damage on themselves.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the next time a target makes a weapon attack roll, that attack roll misses and the target takes {@damage 2d6} psychic damage.
Clumsiness
Hex Spell. For 4 seconds, target and adjacent foes are hexed with Clumsiness. The next time each foe attacks, the attack is interrupted and that foe suffers 10...76...92 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Convert Hexes
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Invert the polarity of hexes affecting a creature, turning necromancy hexes into defense.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. All harmful spells on the target end. For each necromancy spell ended this way, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage when the target takes damage, for the duration.
Convert Hexes
Spell. Remove all hexes from target other ally. For 8...18...20 seconds, that ally gains +10 armor for each Necromancer hex that was removed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Barbs
entries: {@bold Hex}
Curse a creature, to grow necrotic barbs around them, which strangle them every time they take physical damage.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The Target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, when the target takes bludgeoning, piercing or slashing damage, they take an additional {@damage 1d6} damage.
Barbs
Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe takes 1...12...15 more damage when hit by physical damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Disrupting Lunge

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: Command your pet to attempt a Disrupting Lunge, potentially interrupting a creature.

Choose one beast, which obeys your verbal commands, that can hear you within range. The beast uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, of your choice that the beast can see within the beast's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ability/spell fails and has no effect.
If an ability or spell failed this way, the ability/spell can't be used again for the duration.
Disrupting Lunge

Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Disrupting Lunge that deals +1...10...12 damage. If that attack strikes a foe using a skill that skill is interrupted and is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Ignorance
entries: {@bold Hex}
Make a creature ignorant to the power of their signets, disabling them.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target can't use signet spells.
Ignorance
Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds target foe cannot use signets.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Divine Healing
entries: Heal your party.
Choose any number of friendly creatures within range. A target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Divine Healing
Spell. Heals you and party members within earshot for 15...51...60 points.

spell.name: Consume Corpse
entries: Exploit a corpse to teleport to its location and empower yourself.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target so that you can teleport within 5 feet of the target to an unoccupied space that you can see. Then you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier and your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d4}.
Consume Corpse
Spell. Exploit a random corpse. You teleport to that corpse's location and gain 25...85...100 Health and 5...17...20 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd and the healing increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Dryder's Defenses
entries: {@bold Stance}
Channel the magical defenses of dryder's, increasing your armor against attacks and taking less damage from elemental damage.

For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC against weapon attacks and when you take acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, you can roll {@dice 2d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Dryder's Defenses
Stance. For 5...10...11 seconds, you gain 75% chance to block attacks and 34...55...60 armor against elemental damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Divine Intervention
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Protect a creature from death for a time.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The first time the target would drop to 0 hit points as a result of taking damage, the target instead regains hit points equal to {@dice 6d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier, and the spell ends.

If the spell is still in effect when the target is subjected to an effect that would kill it instantaneously without dealing damage, that effect is instead negated against the target, and the spell ends.
Divine Intervention
Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, the next time target ally receives damage that would be fatal, the damage is negated and that ally is healed for 26...197...240 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Verata's Gaze
entries: Channel the master necromancer Verata and gain control of an undead minion.

Choose one undead creature, which has been created by a spell or an ability, that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes friendly to you.
The amount of targets you can target with this spell increases by 1 when you reach 5th level (2), 11th level (3), and 17th level (4).
Verata's Gaze

Spell. If target hostile animated undead has a master, its bond to its master is broken, making it hostile to all other creatures. If it had no master, you become its master. (50% failure chance with Death Magic 4 or less.)

spell.name: Verata's Aura
entries: {@bold Sacrifice} 33%
Suffuse an area around you with the commanding presence of Verata, the master Necromancer, and gain control of all undead minions.

Choose any number of undead creatures, which have been created by a spell or an ability, that you can see within range. Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target becomes friendly to you for the duration.
Verata's Aura

Enchantment Spell. All hostile animated undead in the area become bound to you. Verata's Aura ends after 120...264...300 seconds. When Verata's Aura ends, you lose your bond with any undead bound to you. (50% failure chance with Death Magic 4 or less.)

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 10 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Energizing Wind
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Summon a nature spirit of the Energizing Wind, reducing spell slot usage but preventing repeated usage.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit, when they cast a spell of 1st level or higher, they cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level lower than required, but they cannot cast spells of the same level for 3 rounds.
Energizing Wind

Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...5...6 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all skills cost 15 less Energy (minimum cost 10 Energy), and skills recharge 25% slower. This spirit dies after 1...25...31 second[s].

components.m: a pitcher of coffee

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th or 7th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Spear of Lightning
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}
Sheath your weapon in lightning, penetrating your enemies defenses.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee or ranged weapon attack against the target (the ranged weapon attack can be made with a -2 penalty, to have the weapon immediately return to you, after it was made). On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d8} lightning damage.
Spear of Lightning
Spear Attack. If this attack hits, it deals +8...18...20 lightning damage. This attack has 25% armor penetration.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the thrown property

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Berserker Stance
entries: {@bold Stance}
Enter a mindless state of berserking, attacking faster and gaining adrenaline as long as you don't use spells or abilities.
For the duration, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn, and your adrenaline gain is increased by 50%.
When you cast a spell or use an ability, this spell ends.
Berserker Stance
Stance. For 5...10...11 seconds, you attack 33% faster and gain 50% more adrenaline. Berserker Stance ends if you use a skill.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the % increases by 50% for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Aftershock
entries: Violently send out a shockwave, dealing more damage to {@condition prone} targets.

Target each creature other than you within range. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d8} force damage. If a target was {@condition prone}, the target takes an additional {@damage 2d8} force damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Aftershock
Spell. Nearby foes are struck for 26...85...100 earth damage. Knocked down foes are struck for 10...56...68 additional earth damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Mantra of Inscriptions
entries: {@bold Stance}
Repeat the mantra of inscriptions, imbuing your signet with improved alacrity.
For the duration, when you cast a signet, which requires a short rest before it can be cast again, it instead only requires you to exit initiative before you can cast it again.
Mantra of Inscriptions
Stance. For 5...21...25 seconds, signets you successfully activate while in this stance recharge 10...34...40% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, the duration increases to 1 hour. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration increases to 8 hours.

spell.name: Draw Conditions
entries: Sacrifice yourself for a companion by taking all their conditions.

Choose one friendly creature other than you within range. You gain a copy of each of the following conditions on the target: {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars},  {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Poisoned} and {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}. End all copied conditions on the target, and you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} per condition removed.
Draw Conditions
Spell. All negative conditions are transferred from target other ally to yourself. For each condition acquired, you gain 6...22...26 Health.

components.m: a pen

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Frozen Soil
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Conjure a spirit of Frozen Soil, trapping souls in the afterlife, preventing resurrection.
Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit, any spell that can resurrect a creature fails and has no effect.
Frozen Soil
Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within its range cannot activate resurrection skills. This spirit dies after 30...78...90 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th or 7th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Deflect Arrows
entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 5, {@bold Stance}
Ready yourself to redirect arrows at your enemies vitals, inflicting {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} on a successful block.

For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC against weapon attacks and if a ranged weapon attack misses you, target each creature other than you within range. A target starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars}, taking {@damage 2d4} damage for 1 minute.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Deflect Arrows
Stance. For 1...5...6 second[s], you have a 75% chance to block attacks. If you block a projectile attack, adjacent foes suffer from Bleeding for 5...13...15 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd and the damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Glyph of Elemental Power
entries: Inscribe the Glyph of Elemental Power into the air, increasing the potency of your elemental spells.

For the duration, when you cast an elemental themed spell, you can cast that spell by using a spell slot which is one level higher than the one used in the casting. After this spell triggers {@dice 1d4 + 1} times, this spell ends.
Glyph of Elemental Power
Glyph. For 25 seconds, your elemental attributes are boosted by 2 for your next 10 spells.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Mantra of Resolve
entries: {@bold Stance}
Start repeating a mantra of resolve, improving your {@status concentration}.
For the duration, when you cast a spell, you cannot be interrupted while casting it, and you have a +5 bonus to Constitution saving throws made to hold {@status concentration} on that spell.
If you prevent an interrupt or succeed a {@status concentration} check because of this bonus, your initiative gets reduced by {@dice 2d6} or this spell ends.
Initiative cannot be reduced below 0 with this spell.
Mantra of Resolve
Stance. For 30...78...90 seconds, you cannot be interrupted, but each time you would have been interrupted, you lose 10...5...4 Energy or Mantra of Resolve ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 1 hour. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 8 hours.

spell.name: Light of Dwayna
entries: Shine the light of Dwayna down on your fallen allies, brining them back to life.

Choose any number of friendly creatures, which have not been dead for more than 1 minute, that you can see within range. A target returns to life with 25% of their maximum hit points. A target is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of their next turn.
This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
Light of Dwayna
Spell. Resurrect all dead party members in the area. They are returned to life with 25% Health and zero Energy.

components.m: diamonds worth 300 gp for each target, which the spell consumes

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 7th.

spell.name: Dark Fury
entries: {@bold Enchantment}, {@bold Order}, {@bold Sacrifice:} 17%
Channel dark energies through your allies, whipping them into a frenzy, allowing them to generate adrenaline.
Target each friendly creature within range. For the duration, a target gains one strike of adrenaline when they take damage, or when they hit with a weapon attack.
Dark Fury
Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, whenever any party member hits with an attack, that party member gains one hit of adrenaline. (50% failure chance with Blood Magic of 4 or less.)

components.m: a piece of flesh of a rabid warg

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Slayer's Spear
entries: Empower your spear to fell great enemies, inflicting a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} to a creature with more health than you.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee or ranged weapon attack against the target (the ranged weapon attack can be made with a -2 penalty, to have the weapon immediately return to you, after it was made). On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d8} damage and if you have less hit points than the target, must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Slayer's Spear
Spear Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +5...21...25 damage. If that foe has more Health than you, that foe suffers from a Deep Wound for 5...17...20 seconds.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the thrown property

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Disrupting Throw

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: Quickly throw a spear, disrupting a creature suffering from at least one condition.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee or ranged weapon attack against the target (the ranged weapon attack can be made with a -2 penalty, to have the weapon immediately return to you, after it was made). On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and, if the target is suffering from a condition, must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ability/spell fails and has no effect.
Disrupting Throw
Spear Attack. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a condition, that foe is interrupted.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the thrown property

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Muddy Terrain
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Call forth a spirit of muddy terrain, slowing down all creatures.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit, a creature's speed is reduced by 5 feet, and they cannot benefit from any effects which increase their speed.
Muddy Terrain
Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. Non-spirit creatures within its range move 10% slower and speed boosts have no effect. This spirit dies after 30...78...90 seconds.

components.m: a handful of dirt and a cup of water

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Riposte

time.condition: which you take when you are hit by a melee attack roll

entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 4
Counter an opponent's attack with a riposte.

If you are wielding a one-handed melee weapon with the light and/or finesse properties, choose one attacking creature that you can see within range. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d4} damage and the attack roll misses.
Riposte
Skill. For 8 seconds, while you have a sword equipped, you block the next melee attack against you and your attacker is struck for 20...68...80 damage.

spell.name: Glyph of Sacrifice
entries: Inscribe the glyph of sacrifice on your arcane focus, allowing you to cast any spell as a reaction, by temporarily disabling it.
For the duration, the next {@dice 1d4} spells can be cast as a reaction, but if cast this way, cannot be cast again until you finish a short rest.
Glyph of Sacrifice
Glyph. For 15 seconds, your next spell casts instantly, but it takes an additional 30 seconds to recharge. Ends prematurely if you use a non-spell skill.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Mantra of Signets
entries: {@bold Stance}
Start chanting a mantra of signets, improving your defense for every signet prepared, and healing yourself every time you use a signet.

For the duration, when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} for every two signet spells you have prepared and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, when you cast a signet spell, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Mantra of Signets
Stance. For 10...34...40 seconds, you have +3 armor for each signet you have equipped. Whenever you use a signet you gain 5...49...60 health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, the duration increases to 1 hour. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration increases to 8 hours.

spell.name: Desecrate Enchantments
entries: Turn the enchantments of a group of creatures against them, dealing increased damage per enchantment on them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage. If a target was under the effect of a beneficial spell, a target takes an additional {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage per beneficial spell on them. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
Desecrate Enchantments
Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes take 6...49...60 shadow damage and 4...17...20 shadow damage for each enchantment on them.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the base damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Nature's Renewal
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Call forth a spirit of Nature's Renewal, which increases the casting time of all {@status concentration} spells and increases the load of bonds.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit and casts a spell, which requires {@status concentration} or is an Enchantment/Hex, that spell requires twice as long to cast. Additionally, creatures within 120 feet of the nature spirit, which have bonds active, reduce their spell save DC and spell attack bonus by a further 1 for each active bond.
Nature's Renewal

Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For 30...126...150 seconds, enchantments and hexes cast by non-spirit creatures in range take twice as long to cast, and it costs twice as much Energy to maintain enchantments. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Mark of Rodgort
entries: {@bold Hex}
Inscribe the mark of Rodgort into the flesh of a group of creatures, causing them to erupt into flames whenever they take fire damage.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, when a target takes fire damage except from {@condition burning|GuildWars}, it starts {@condition burning|GuildWars} for 1 round, taking {@damage 4d6} damage.
Mark of Rodgort
Hex Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes are hexed with Mark of Rodgort. For 10...30...35 seconds, whenever each foe is struck for fire damage, that foe is set on fire for 1...3...4 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration of the {@condition burning|GuildWars} condition increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Infuse Condition
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Create a tether between yourself and any undead minions you have, automatically transferring conditions from yourself to them.

For the duration, when you would gain one or more of the following conditions, the closest friendly undead creature, which has been created by a spell or an ability, within 30-feet of you, gains it instead: {@condition Bleeding|GuildWars}, {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Burning|GuildWars},  {@condition Corruption|GuildWars}, {@condition Cracked Armor|GuildWars}, {@condition Crippled|GuildWars}, {@condition Dazed|GuildWars}, {@condition Deafened}, {@condition Deep Wound|GuildWars}, {@condition Disease|GuildWars}, {@condition Poisoned} or {@condition Weakness|GuildWars}.
Infuse Condition
Enchantment Spell. For the next 15...51...60 seconds, whenever you receive a condition, that condition is transferred to your closest minion instead.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 15 feet for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Primal Echoes
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Summon a nature spirit of the Primal Echoes, making signets cost spell slots.
Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit, when the creature casts a signet spell, the spell still consumes a spell slot.
Primal Echoes
Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 Spirit. For non-Spirit creatures within its range, Signets cost 10 Energy to use. This Spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Rust
entries: {@bold Hex}
Cause rust to appear on a group of creature's gear and signets, dealing damage and disrupting signets.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d12} cold damage and signet spells take twice as long to cast for the duration. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
{@bold Overcast:}. Creatures who failed the saving throw cannot use their signets for the duration, instead of them taking twice as long to cast.
Rust

Hex Spell. Deals 10...58...70 cold damage to target and adjacent foes. For 5...17...20 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes take twice as long to activate signets. If you are Overcast, foes struck with Rust have their signets interrupted and disabled for 1...8...10 second[s].

components.m: a drop of water, and a pocketwatch

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Signet of Weariness
entries: {@bold Signet:} Short Rest
Tire out a group of enemies with your signet of weariness, afflicting them with {@condition weakness|GuildWars} and lowering their initiative.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition weakness|GuildWars|weakened} for the duration and their initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d8}.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Signet of Weariness
Signet. Target foe and all nearby foes lose 3...7...8 Energy and suffer from Weakness for 1...10...12 second[s].

spell.name: Searing Heat
entries: Cause an area of extreme heat, searing all those inside.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d8} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
When this spell ends, all creatures in the spell's area start {@condition burning|GuildWars} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 2d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

components.m: coals and a bellow

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.
Searing Heat

Spell. Cause Searing Heat at target foe's location. For 5 seconds, foes near this location are struck for 10...34...40 fire damage each second. When Searing Heat ends, foes in the area of effect are set on fire for 3 seconds.

spell.name: Soothing Images
entries: {@bold Hex}
Project calming images into a group of creature's minds, quenching their battle fury, preventing them from gaining Adrenaline.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, a target cannot gain Adrenaline.
Soothing Images
Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes cannot gain adrenaline.

components.m: a painting of a kitten

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Order of Pain
entries: {@bold Enchantment}, {@bold Order}, {@bold Sacrifice:} 17%
Induct your allies into the Order of Pain, making their physical attacks stronger.
Target each friendly creature within range. For the duration, a target's weapon attacks, which deal bludgeoning, piercing or slashing damage, deal an additional {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage.
Order of Pain
Enchantment Spell. For 5 seconds, whenever a party member hits a foe with physical damage, that party member does +3...13...16 damage.

components.m: a piece of barbed wire

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Scourge Sacrifice
entries: {@bold Hex}
Muddle the power of blood for a group of creatures, requiring them to sacrifice twice as much health for sacrifice spells.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, when a target sacrifices health for a spell, they must sacrifice 100% more.
Scourge Sacrifice
Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, every time target foe and adjacent foes sacrifice life, they sacrifice twice the normal amount.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Verata's Sacrifice
entries: {@bold Sacrifice:} 15%
Channel the devotion to his minions the great Necromancer Verata had, sacrificing yourself to heal them and cleanse them of most conditions.

Choose any number of friendly undead creatures, which have been created by a spell or an ability, that you can see. For the duration at the start of each of a target's turns, a target regains hit points equal to {@dice 4d4}. Additionally, you gain a copy of each of the following conditions on a target: Bleeding, {@condition Blinded|XPHB}, Burning, Corruption, Cracked Armor, Crippled, Dazed, {@condition Deafened|XPHB}, Deep Wound, Disease, {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} and Weakness. End all copied conditions on a target.
If a target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends on them.
If you cast this spell while you have control over less than 4 friendly undead creatures, which have been created by a spell or an ability, you regain the spell slot expended in the casting.
Verata's Sacrifice

Spell. For 5...9...10 seconds, your undead allies gain +10 Health regeneration. All conditions are removed from those allies and transferred to you. If this spell is successful and you have control of 3 or fewer minions, Verata's Sacrifice instantly recharges.

components.m: a drop of blood

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Symbiotic Bond
entries: Form a symbiotic bond between yourself and an animal companion, giving them health regeneration, and absorbing damage for them.

Choose one beast, which obeys your verbal commands, that can hear you within range. For the duration, the target has resistance to all damage. Also, each time the target takes damage, you lose health equal to the damage taken. Additionally, for the duration, at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Symbiotic Bond
Shout. For 120...264...300 seconds, your animal companion gains 1...3...3 Health regeneration, and half of all damage dealt to your animal companion is redirected to you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.
When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Warrior's Cunning
entries: {@bold Unblockable}
Draw upon your knowledge, overcoming any unexpected defenses.
For the duration, your attacks gain the Unblockable property.
Warrior's Cunning
Skill. For 5...10...11 seconds, your melee attacks cannot be blocked.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 10 minutes. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 1 hour.

spell.name: Ash Blast
entries: Spray a group of enemies with a handful of ashes, blinding {@condition burning|GuildWars} creatures.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d4} force damage and, if a target is {@condition burning|GuildWars}, is {@condition blinded} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Ash Blast
Hex Spell. Target and adjacent foes are struck for 35...59...65 earth damage. Burning foes struck by Ash Blast are hexed for 5 seconds and have a 20...64...75% chance to miss with attacks.

components.m: a pocket full of sand

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Armor of Unfeeling
entries: Cover your spirits in an armor of unfeeling, reducing the damage they take and making them immune to critical hits.
Choose any number of friendly summoning rituals that you can see within range. All targets have resistance to all damage and do not take extra damage from critical hits.
Armor of Unfeeling
Skill. For 10...30...35 seconds, your spirits within earshot take 50% less damage and are immune to critical attacks.

components.m: a sliver of deldrimor steel

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Blind Was Mingson
entries: {@bold Urn}
Create a scarlet urn containing the ashes of Mingson, blinding creatures around you when you drop them.

You create an urn in your hands. When you drop this urn, target each creature other than you within range. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition blinded} for 1 minute.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Blind Was Mingson
Item Spell. Hold Mingson's ashes for up to 15...51...60 seconds. When you drop his ashes, all nearby foes are Blinded for 3...7...8 seconds.

components.m: the ashes of a blind creature

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Bloodsong
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Bloodsong|GuildWars}
Bind a Spirit of Bloodsong to your will, siphoning off health with its attacks.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Bloodsong|GuildWars} for the duration. The spirit is friendly to you and your allies. The spirit acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. The spirit is in the DMs control.
Bloodsong
Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10...12 spirit who dies after 30...126...150 seconds. Attacks by that spirit steal up to 5...21...25 Health.

components.m: a poem written in blood

spell.name: Boon of Creation
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Receive a boon every time you create a new creature.

For the duration, when you summon/create a creature, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + spellcasting ability modifier and your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d4} + spellcasting ability modifier.
Boon of Creation
Enchantment Spell. For 15...51...60 seconds, whenever you create a creature, you gain 5...41...50 Health and 1...5...6 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 1 hour. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 8 hours.

spell.name: Brutal Weapon
entries: {@bold Weapon Spell}
Temporarily transform a weapon into a brutal weapon, visibly making its appearance more brutal and increasing its damage as long as the wielder is not under the effect of any enchantment spells.

Choose one friendly creature, which is wielding a weapon, that you can see within range. For the duration, while the target is not under the effect of a beneficial {@status Concentration|XPHB}/enchantment spell, the target's weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d6} damage.
Brutal Weapon
Weapon Spell. Give target ally a Brutal Weapon for 10...34...40 seconds. The bearer's weapon strikes for +5...13...15 damage as long as the bearer is under no enchantments.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for every two slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Channeled Strike
entries: Channel your magic into a lightning bolt, increasing its power if you are holding an object created by a spell.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d12} lightning damage. If you are holding an object created by a spell, the target takes an additional {@damage 2d6} lightning damage.
Channeled Strike
Spell. Target foe is struck for 5...77...95 lightning damage. That foe is struck for an additional 5...29...35 lightning damage if you are holding an item.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the initial damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 2nd and the conditional damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Blinding Powder
entries: {@bold Off-Hand Attack}
Quickly throw a handful of blinding powder at a group of creatures.
Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a
Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition blinded} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Blinding Powder
Spell. Must follow an off-hand attack. Target foe and all adjacent foes become Blinded for 3...13...15 seconds.

components.m: a handful of sand

spell.name: Caltrops
entries: Throw out a handful of caltrops, crippling creatures in an area.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition crippled|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Caltrops
Spell. Target foe and all foes adjacent to your target are Crippled for 5...13...15 seconds. Caltrops has half the normal range.

components.m: a handful of metal spike

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Cruel Was Daoshen
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}, {@bold Urn}
Create a scarlet urn containing the ashes of Daoshen, granting your lightning spells the ability to penetrate armor, and dealing lightning damage when dropping them.
You create an urn in your hands. While holding the Urn created by this spell, your Ritualist themed spells which deal lightning damage gain the armor penetration property.

When you drop this urn, target each creature other than you within range. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d8} lightning damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Cruel Was Daoshen

Item Spell. Hold Daoshen's ashes for up to 15...51...60 seconds. While you hold his ashes, all Ritualist skills have 10% armor penetration. When you drop his ashes, all nearby foes are struck for 15...71...85 lightning damage.

components.m: the ashes of an evil creature

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Crippling Dagger
entries: Throw out a crippling projectile.

Choose one creature that you can see within the throw range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target (the ranged weapon attack can be made with a -2 penalty, to have the weapon immediately return to you, after it was made). On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes {@condition crippled|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

At 5th level, the ranged attack also deals an extra {@damage 1d8} piercing damage to the target on a hit. This damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 11th level ({@dice 2d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 3d8}).
Crippling Dagger

Spell. Send out a Crippling Dagger at target foe. Crippling Dagger strikes for 15...51...60 earth damage if it hits, and Cripples moving foes for 3...13...15 seconds. This spell has half the normal range.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the light and thrown property

spell.name: Critical Eye
entries: Enhance your vision to quickly spot critical weak spots in an enemies defenses.
For the duration, the number you need to roll to score a critical hit gets reduced by 1 and when you score a critical hit, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d4}.
Critical Eye
Skill. For 10...30...35 seconds, you have an additional 3...13...15% chance to land a critical hit when attacking. You gain 1 Energy whenever you score a critical hit.

components.m: a jewelers lens

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number you need to roll to score a critical hit get reduced by 1 for every two spell slot level above 1st and the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Lava Arrows
entries: Conjure up a volley of lava arrows and yeet them at up to three targets.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Target up to two other creatures other than the target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Make a ranged spell attack against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 1d4} fire damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d4} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}).
Lava Arrows
Spell. Lava Arrows fly toward up to 3 foes near your target and strike for 20...56...65 fire damage if they hit.

spell.name: Images of Remorse
entries: {@bold Hex}

Conjure up an illusion which shows a creature images of remorse, forcing them to relive their most horrible moments, inflicting damage to them every turn, and extra damage if they attacked on their last turn.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save if the target attacked on its last turn, the target takes {@damage 2d10} psychic damage. Additionally, for the duration, at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
Images of Remorse
Hex Spell. For 5...9...10 seconds, target foe suffers -1...3...3 Health degeneration. If that foe was attacking, that foe takes 10...44...52 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the initial damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd and the damage over time increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Dwayna's Sorrow
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Create a small connection to Dwayna in a group of allies, causing her to shed healing tears when any of them reach 0 hit points.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each friendly creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point is under the effect of Dwayna's Sorrow. For the duration, if a creature drops to 0 hit points, you can choose any number of friendly creatures, except the creature that dropped to 0 hit points, within 300-feet. A target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Dwayna's Sorrow

Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, target ally and all nearby allies are enchanted with Dwayna's Sorrow. If an ally dies while under the effects of Dwayna's Sorrow, your party is healed for 5...41...50.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Bitter Chill
entries: Chill a creature to the bones.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d6} cold damage and if the target had more hit points than you do, you regain the spell slot expended in the casting. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, but you cannot regain a spell slot.
Bitter Chill
Spell. Target foe is struck for 15...51...60 cold damage. If that foe had more Health than you, Bitter Chill recharges instantly.

components.m: bottled cold air

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Dissonance
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Spirit of Dissonance|GuildWars}
Bind a Spirit of Dissonance to your will, interrupting attacks.

Summon a {@creature Spirit of Dissonance|GuildWars} for the duration. The spirit is friendly to you and your allies. The spirit acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. The spirit is in the DMs control.
Dissonance
Binding Ritual. Create a level 1...10...12 spirit. This spirit deals 5...17...20 damage and anyone struck by its attack is interrupted. This spirit dies after 10...22...25 seconds.

components.m: a poem written about strife

spell.name: Dancing Daggers
entries: {@bold Lead Attack}
Throw out three projectiles in quick succession.

Choose one creature that you can see within the throw range of your weapon. Make three ranged weapon attacks against the target (a ranged weapon attack can be made with a -2 penalty, to have the weapon immediately return to you, after it was made). On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects.
The number of attacks you can make when you cast this spell increases by 1 when you reach 5th level (4 attacks), 11th level (5 attacks), and 17th level (6 attacks).
Dancing Daggers
Spell. Send out three Dancing Daggers at target foe, each striking for 5...29...35 earth damage if they hit. Dancing Daggers has half the normal range. This skill counts as a lead attack.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp with the light and thrown property

spell.name: Lightning Hammer
entries: {@bold Armor Penetration}
Conjure a lightning hammer above a creature's head, and smite them with thunderous force.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 12d8} lightning damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target has {@condition cracked armor|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Lightning Hammer
Spell. Target foe is struck for 10...82...100 lightning damage and applies[sic] Cracked Armor for 5...17...20 seconds. Lightning Hammer has 25% armor penetration.

components.m: a light hammer

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Healing Whisper
entries: Whisper words of healing to a creature, mending their wounds.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d6} + {@dice 1d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} and {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Healing Whisper
Spell. Target other ally is healed for 40...88...100. This spell has half the normal range.

spell.name: Blood Bond
entries: {@bold Hex}
Establish a blood bond between yourself and a group of creatures, healing allies that hit them or are in the area when they die.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each hostile creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, your allies regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} when they hit a target with a weapon attack and {@dice 2d4} if they are within 10 feet of a target if it reaches 0 hit points.
Blood Bond

Hex Spell. For 3...10...12 seconds, target foe and all adjacent foes are hexed with Blood Bond. Whenever an ally hits one of them with an attack, that ally gains 5...17...20 Health. If one of these foes dies while hexed, all allies adjacent to that foe are healed for 20...84...100 Health.

components.m: blood matching the targets type

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the on hit healing increases by {@dice 1d4} and the on death healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Brambles
entries: {@bold Summoning Ritual:} {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars}
Call forth a spirit of brambles, hurting and making creature bleed, which fall {@condition prone}.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. While a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit and falls {@condition prone}, they take {@damage 4d4} damage and start {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 2d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Brambles

Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 Spirit. Non-Spirit creatures that are knocked down in its range take 5 damage and begin Bleeding for 5...17...20 seconds. This Spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
Additionally, when you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Doom
entries: Spell out a person's doom by making all your summoning rituals whisper eldritch truths to them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d6} lighting damage per summoning ritual within range. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
Doom
Spell. Strike target foe for 10...34...40 lightning (maximum 135) damage for every recharging binding ritual you have.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the final damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Furious Axe
entries: Channel your fury into a strike, gaining adrenaline on a miss.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d8} damage.
On a miss, you gain {@dice 1d4} strikes of adrenaline.
Furious Axe
Axe Attack. If Furious Axe hits, you strike for +5...29...35 damage. If it is blocked you gain 3 strikes worth of adrenaline.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

spell.name: Dash
entries: {@bold Stance}
Quickly dash to a new location.
For the duration, your speed is increased by 50%.
Dash
Stance. For 3 seconds, you run 50% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Sliver Armor
entries: {@bold Enchantment}
Conjure an armor of obsidian slivers around your body, blocking attacks and lashing out around you when attacked.

For the duration, you have a +3 bonus to AC against weapon attacks and if you are the target of an attack or spell, target one random creature other than you within range. The target takes {@damage 2d6} force damage.
Sliver Armor

Enchantment Spell. For 5...10...11 seconds, you have 25...45...50% chance to block attacks and whenever you are the target of a hostile spell or attack one nearby foe is struck for 5...29...35 earth damage.

components.m: a sliver of obsidian

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the AC bonus increases by 1 for every two slot level above 4th and the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Signet of Disruption

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within 60 feet of you casting a spell or a hexed creature using an ability

entries: {@bold Signet:} Short Rest
You activate your signet of disruption in response to a creature casting a spell or a hexed creature using an ability, sending out a psychic spike, potentially disrupting that creature.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower or if that creature is hexed and is using an ability, the spell/ability fails and has no effect. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.

If you successfully interrupt a spell/ability this way, the target must make an Intelligence saving throw with disadvantage. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d6} psychic damage. If you did not successfully interrupt a spell/ability this way, the creature makes the saving throw with advantage.
Signet of Disruption
Signet. If target foe is casting a spell, the spell is interrupted and that foe suffers 10...43...51 damage. If that foe is hexed, Signet of Disruption can interrupt any non-spell skills.

spell.name: Rising Bile
entries: {@bold Hex:} You cannot choose to end {@status Concentration|XPHB} on this spell.
Start festering a glob of bile in a creature's stomach, making it explode when the spell ends.
Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. The target is hexed with {@spell Rising Bile|GuildWars}.

When this spell ends, target each hostile creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage per round {@spell Rising Bile|GuildWars} was on the initial target before ending. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Rising Bile
Hex Spell. For 20 seconds, this hex does nothing. When Rising Bile ends, that foe and all foes in the area take 1...5...6 damage for each second Rising Bile was in effect.

components.m: the bile of a zombie

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Lion's Comfort
entries: {@bold Adrenaline:} 4
Take comfort in the healing embrace of the Elonian sun, just like a prairie lion.
You cannot use your signets, or {@spell Lion's Comfort|GuildWars}, for the duration.
You regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + spellcasting ability modifier, and you gain {@dice 1d4} strikes of Adrenaline.
Lion's Comfort
Skill. All of your signets are disabled for 12 seconds. You are healed for 50...98...110 Health, and gain 0...2...3 strike[s] of adrenaline.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st, the adrenaline gain increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st and the duration increases by 2 rounds for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Predatory Bond
entries: Form a bond with a beat companion, imbuing it with unnatural speed and siphoning health with its attacks.

Choose one beast, which obeys your verbal commands, that can hear you within range. For the duration, the target can attack one additional time when it takes the attack action on its turn and when the target hits with an attack, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4}.
Predatory Bond
Shout. For 5...17...20 seconds, your animal companion attacks 25% faster and heals you for 1...25...31 Health with each successful attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Draw Spirit
entries: Beckon an allied spirit to your location, relocating it.
Target one friendly summoning ritual that you can see within range. The target gets teleported within 5 feet of you to an unoccupied space.
The number of targets you can target with this spell increases by 1 when you reach 5th level (2), 11th level (3), and 17th level (4).
Draw Spirit
Spell. Teleport target allied spirit to your location.

spell.name: Summon Spirits
entries: Summon all allied spirits to your location, relocating and healing them.
Target each friendly summoning rituals that you can see within range. A target gets teleported within 5 feet of you to an unoccupied space and regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4}.
Summon Spirits
Spell. All spirits you control Shadow Step to your location, and gain 60...100 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st.
